comments: Saw in Facebook and thought I would give it a try. I am now addicted. I love how realistic they make the interaction seem. The only things that would make it better is if it would let us type our own responses and the system understood them and was able to respond and if there was actually more "proving innocence" and less tetrisy type games.. But that doesn't not effect my interest at all. Most addictive and fun game I have found. Will def recommend

UPDATE : Changed from 5 stars to 3 because of the puzzles. As you get further into the game, it is obvious that you are supposed to spend money because you are literally not given enough of the right color blocks to complete the puzzles without purchased hacks. That really sucks. Too bad.    This is an interesting game with some unique interfaces and an engrossing plot. You interact with the other characters (in-game AI) via chat, and telephone (in-game AI) to learn the plot and your place in it. In order to access the info you need to move forward, you have to solve puzzles. Very cool, love it.

It is great, nice and interesting story that makes me keep playing. What really bothers me is the fact that the puzzle takes FOREVER to solve. I know that the farther you are in a game the harder it gets, but it's just not logic to collect 25 pieces of each color at a puzzle and they only throw you 15-20 pieces and in such little amount of moves. The only way to solve it is spending money buying hacks or having too much patience. I would have deleted it long time ago if it wasn't for the story.

This game is great. It's my favorite game of all thus far. I love this game. It's so addicting and the story line is perfect. I love how you can text and also receive/make calls. Great game for people who like puzzles and mystery. Passes the time quickly. Only thing I am having problems with is trying to link it to my facebook. The first time I had this game I had gotten pretty far and logged in with ease, long story short, got a new phone, installed my game, try to connect to my facebook for my saved game and.... my phone glitches and shuts me out. So I had to start over. Other than that this game is great I would recommend to anyone.

I like the idea but the responses are off quite often. For example: "Please don't hang up!" -I'm here "I don't know! Not a clue. Doesn't make sense and breaks the immersion.   It's another game similar to SIM - Sara is Missing, which I'd recommend for now. It's more polished and engaging. The characters are more distinct than in I Am Innocent.  This just seems to be designed to make you spend cash eventually, not because someone actually enjoyed developing it.

It's honestly pretty good. It's rare that an app game keeps my attention for more than a week, but this one has kept me going for a while now. The story is interesting enough for me to keep going with the puzzles, however, I would like a little more writing and editing to be done with the dialogue. It can be kinda regular and break immersion. But it's still entertaining.
description: I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. The killings are somehow connected to the disappearance of your sister many years ago.The game‚Äôs many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that‚Äôll keep you engrossed to the very end.Main features:- Investigate a complicated serial killer case.- Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking.- Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text.- Your answers affect your relationships with the characters.- Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships.- Many days of gameplay.This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.
descriptionHTML:
I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. The killings are somehow connected to the disappearance of your sister many years ago.

The game’s many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that’ll keep you engrossed to the very end.

Main features:

- Investigate a complicated serial killer case.
- Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking.
- Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text.
- Your answers affect your relationships with the characters.
- Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships.
- Many days of gameplay.

This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.

description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making
descriptionHTML:
This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. comments: The game has gorgeous graphics. Each scene is very detailed and fun to play. Some are a little difficult to get through if you like to keep your brightness low like me and some items are incredibly tiny to find. But it has a fun premise and it's a pretty good time waster. However, you can't play for long. Each play takes 20 energy and it goes by quickly. Waiting for it to refill takes a long time. Getting stars to solve cases also takes some time. It's basically the wait time in this game that kinda kills it.

This is a really enjoyable game, especially for fans of HP and/or the fantasy genre. The graphics are beautiful and the characters look so real. I just wish energy wasn't used up so quickly. At 20 points of energy a pop you can't really play for long, and the XP needed to level up is also high so you usually have to wait for the energy to refill. Also, when you level up you don't get a complete energy refill; you only get about half. Waiting time to complete tasks is also too high IMO. At least a couple of hours if not longer. With any other game this is usually enough to turn me off but the gameplay, the story and the graphics are so good that I'm willing to exercise a lot of patience.

Beautiful hidden object experience. Offers a variety of gameplay including mirrored levels, timed levels, and spot the differences. The Facebook connection is there without being thrown in your face like some other games and is a nice subtle addition. It does work off of energy however I am willing to stick it out just for the storyline.

It's a good game but having to wait so long for the energy build up takes away the excitement of the game play. Iv noticed alot of other game users have the same outlook on this game. Even the timers for tasks take way to long.. 6 hours to complete? Really? Why so long? People will get bored and find another stimulating game. This is based on the whole wizarding world so it should be alot more magical and less time consuming.

Love the game overall but it takes way too long to build up energy. Because of this you are only able to play for very short periods of time before you have to wait for the energy to build back up. Also some of the 'inspection' actions take way too long. Waiting 6+ hours for an action to be completed is excessive. I would love to be able to play the game for more than just a couple of minutes a day. I realize it is done to encourage people to make in app purchases, however, perhaps you could provide a paid version of the app to avoid this. I love the game and would love to be able to play it more.

Love this game, but it has only 14 cases!! WTH?? The last case acted like you were going on to another one, but no. Feel like it shouldn't have been released with only 14 cases. Very similar to Criminal Case in a lot of ways. The upgrades help a lot, but it takes a while before you notice their effect and cost is too high, IMO.

comments: Fun gameplay, but a bit buggy and confusing when a train is near a switch since you often stop a train when trying to switch it. Difficulty ramps up to insanely unfair after the first few levels. Since the passengers spawn at random even when you're absolutely perfect at switching the trains you still don't often get 3 stars on the level. Getting 3 stars on a level is basically luck at that point.

Awesome game. Very nice controls but greedy devs. I spend money in games but to pay 59 sek just to remove ads is too much. And too many ads which spoils the otherwise great game. Either reduce the cost to remove ads or include other benefits to the same cost. The frequency of ads should be reduced.

This game was great for the first few levels, and then some frustrations set in about the design. Some levels are just tough to see which tracks go where because of the nature of the isometric view, but the real deal breaker for me is having to click the arrow to switch a track path. Why can't this be a lever to the side of the track, especially when two path switches overlap? Countless times I've accidentally stopped a train on an intersection instead of switching the track for the next train. It tests your patience instead of your multitasking and tracking abilities. The ads are very, very plentiful. I urge you to continue using the free version if you want to support the devs because they probably get more revenue from ads in the long run than the $5 cost to remove the ads. Potentially great.

This game was honestly amazing. I love how it's such a simple game yet it's so much fun to play. The low poly graphics and the music really synchronized and make it so much more better. Even the tutorial, it integrates into the game in a very interesting manner. The only problem was that it lags a bit, but otherwise Northplay, loved it!
Hadn't played it for a while, went back and it had deleted all my progress. Not going to start again, so deleting the app
Excellent so far. A little expensive for "no ads" and just shuts on the back button - no confirmation
description: Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.  Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.  As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.  ‚Ä¢ Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds ‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches ‚Ä¢ Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions ‚Ä¢ Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection ‚Ä¢ Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit ‚Ä¢ Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ ‚Ä¢ Share your most explosive crashes with your friends ‚Ä¢ Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon K√∂lle
descriptionHTML:
Conduct THIS! Is an adictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.

Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.

As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.

• Conduct trains in beautiful low-poly 3D worlds
• Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, just tap to start/stop trains and control switches
• Transport passengers, earn coins and unlock new themed regions
• Unlock trains found in the real world, such as the French TGV and Japanese Shinkansen, to expand your train collection
• Seriously challenging puzzles in clever levels that will push you to the limit
• Earn awards for completing regions and marvel at your success in the company HQ
• Share your most explosive crashes with your friends
• Fantastic soundtrack by composer Simon Kölle

descriptionHTML:
Exploration pro is a new exciting adventure in the boundless cubic world!
Here you will will feel the freedom for your creativity. You can dream to the max! You are not limited to, there are no limits!
If you like extreme sports and you are not looking for easy ways - then play in the survival mode. Here you get a lot of useful skills for survival and a lot of adrenaline!
If you want to do all what you want without restrictions - more likely to create a world in creative mode!
Here you will find all the necessary materials for the construction,
crafts, hunting, with which you can build and create anything you want

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:
Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.
The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.

In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.


Good luck and have a fun!

comments: Very simple. Gives me a lot of nostalgia. Two things though, it seriously needs music maybe some Celtic tunes or shanties. And secondly it needs more stuff to do. When I first saw a whale I was excited about doing some whaling but nope. The whales do absolutely nothing. Maybe even some treasure hunting puzzles or something. Good game just needs a little more content.

Good game however, once you've taken control of all the islands there is little else to keep you interested. I would look at adding more world's and making the trading a real economy by having the ability to buy items and sell them for a profit in different ports. Potentially even have your ports taken over again or mutiny so you need to recapture them.

Overall the game is great. Gameplay is smooth but slow (hey, old ships), making the gameplay calming. Graphics are pleasing to the eyes, though it could still need improvements. Sounds are calming too.   You guys should change the image for the gold coins since it resembles a symbol in One Piece. And also the whale movement could be smoother and slower. You could add more creatures in the ocean in addition to the whale since its just blank at times.

It's a really great game! I'm really looking forward to an update. I think it'd be REALLY helpful to be able to purchase an extra boat that just goes around and picks up boxes.. Having to turn around all the time gets tedious. Also an online pvp would be awesome. Maybe have the ability to make clans with your friends that can attack other clans. I'm looking forward to see what you guys do!

This game is great overall and you have a great sense of progression as your ship gets bigger and faster. The problem is the controls themselves. I found it very hard( I noticed this when I reached HP or ship level 6 ) and sometimes close to impossible to fire at other ship even at point blank range. The game has a very hard time trying to focus on one ship and would often shoot at where the enemy was 3 seconds ago especially when there is more than 3 ships at once which often happens. I would recommend a fire button option to compliment the controls and the gameplay experience. As I said before, it is indeed a very amusing game and would be even more enjoyable with this added feature.

Great game in all honesty I can actually see myself playing this game for weeks to months. Everything about it is perfect and I  love how it is not based on a story.   Note devs: for some reason after playing for 10 min strait my boat gets to the point where it can't hit a single shot so I have to restart the game.

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

Not bad for free. Minimal ads. The two drawbacks are that in career mode, the game is slanted in the opponents favour too much. And in 1 on 1, it takes forever to load an opponent. Fix that and I would give it a five star rating. Also, it would be nice to see the developer actually respond to some people's concerns.

comments: I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club or Cart Thills can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug to me or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.  Edit: I love the events, especially the cart one.

It's a good attempt but too easy to die. No water. Seriously? I have an empty bottle yet nothing to put in it. I would like the chance to explore and build BEFORE I die five times and can't reclaim the stuff I've spent time collecting.  If these things are remedied I'll try again. Till then, deleting.

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Very good idea but lack of some stuff like improvements. Right now the demolition system not work and we cannot move the walls or floors. The energy should be more sustainable and will be good if the trees on the base and some stuff randomly spawn. I will drop the game for now and on the future i Will give another shoot

The game is ok.. i love the idea.. but in all RPG and similar games you can accuire your items from when you died from your body in that zone.. also its good when you enter the inventory to pause the game.. when entering a zone the game should give some time before reseting the material and monsters if the player re-enters the same zone.. These are the most critical points so far i have encountered.. please take these in consideration.. thank you

descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
recentChanges: ‚Äî Invisible character issue on some devices is fixed
‚Äî Game progress saving system is improved
‚Äî Rare case with empty event chests is fixed
‚Äî An issue with other exiles' corpses disappearance is fixed
‚Äî The Night Guest now comes later and less frequently
summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. descriptionHTML:
Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.

This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.

Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.

It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.

Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:
- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.
- Different sections of roads.
- Simple logic.
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.
- Does not contain purchases within the application.
- Hours of fun.
- No annoying ads.
- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.
- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.
- Video game totally free.
- You do not need the Internet.
- It takes up little space.
- You can train the mind.

Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

description: CLASSIC BUBBLE SHOOTING FUN!Match, pop and burst all the colorful bubbles in this addictive, enjoyable puzzle game. Play now for free and enjoy plenty of challenging puzzles and levels.  The fun never ends with Ultimate Bubbles! Experience the thrill of shooting and blasting bubbles and challenge yourself with thousands of exciting levels as you advance through the game. Join the fun and enjoy popping all the colored balls anytime and anywhere you want.   If you love online puzzle games and just can‚Äôt get enough of exciting brain teasers, Ultimate Bubbles is the perfect game for you!  Play & Discover:- Crazy bubble popping fun.   - Thousands of levels to solve, with unique features and challenges. - Awesome boosters and power-ups. - Free to play!- Addictive gameplay, cool visual effects.  Pop all Bubbles to Win!- Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to burst bubbles.  	- Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop. - Boost your experience with awesome power-ups. - Master all the different challenges and solve fun puzzles.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                - Crush the bubbles and clear the board.                                                                                                 - Pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball that will burn every bubble on the way.                         - Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.                   - Take your time and plan your moves. Start the thrilling adventure today and explore plenty of exciting levels packed with awesome power-ups and challenging puzzles. Thanks for playing and enjoy the game!

comments: Video adds for mobile and long answer times reslly take the fun out of it. As a f2p player you can duel up to 8 other players. If you are unlucky like me this means you cant play if they take hours to answer 3 questions! (Timewindow to answer: 48 hours) :(

Latest update: The agressive pop up ads are gone and have been replaced by video ads. Even when connected to mobile data services. I wouldn't say this is an improvement. Draining my data volume for advertisement is not nice. It's just greedy. This app is producing so much money anyways, why video ads? Wouldn't normal images be enough?  Update: The agressive advertisement is back and it's worse than ever. There are huge amounts of unauthorised browser popups partly midgame and even when the app is simply running in the background. This needs to be addressed!  Earlier: I like this app a lot. The concept behind it is great and it's great fun to play. The questions are mostly balanced aside from the annoyingly football heavy sports category. Lately though the app kept opening up dubious websitest, usually at the beginning of a round. This is absolutely untolerable (!). It should not have the permission to do this. I've been hoping for the latest fee updates to fix this - they didn't.
Die App macht was sie soll, aber die Menge an Werbung ist sehr anstr√§ngend.  Nach JEDER Runde muss man einen GANZEN Werbespot zu Ende schauen. Dann lieber doch ein Banner.

So viel Werbung !! An sich ein super Spiel, aber tonnenweise Werbung. Macht den gesamten Spielspa√ü kaputt.  Richtig , richtig schlecht gemacht von den Leute , so viel Werbung darein zu packen. 30 sec und keine M√∂glichkeit zu √ºberspringen!!!!!!!! 5 Sterne, sobald weniger Werbung dabei ist.
Too many stupid and irrelevant questions
Mehr Werbung bitte.

comments: Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

If possible need there needs to be another look at the position of your car during the race. Ice noticed mulitple times that once i get to first place, i win in first but when i go ro collect thw reward cash it always says seventh or eighth place.. its really irking.  Please fix. Otherwise i do enjoy the game

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

This game has definitely improved since I'd last played it but, there is still some room for improvement. Controls are one thing. This has always been a problem. More controls need to be added, like the steering wheel. Also, real tracks and events. I'm not sure can you actually do this but if you can, please add this and also, graphics. If you could put in some better shaders and if you could improve upon the car models. This game is okay. I rate this 6/10.
description: Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

comments: Amazing game. Me and my friend spend hours on it. I get to shows him my mods. He has none though we both have completed the levels. The game NEVER AND I REPEAT NEVER gets boring. Definitely better than the angry birds series must download. The only problome is the metal flap things don't work correctly. They just float in midair.Apart from that  Please make a new selection of levels. My life depends on it!!!!

The game and level desgins promote and foster a great degree of creastive thinking. With very unique mechanics and obstacles that actually require thought and consideration when building. It has great art, along with many bonus levels and content. Fun game overall but level experiences do wildly vary sometimes. From simple to extremely  difficult, sometimes you win by mer luck and not strategy. Along with all that I don't know if anyone else experienced this but the levers on lvl6 were buggy and never worked. All in all good game to play.

Great game but el porkado is broken I can barley ever get any crates, they are in levels that are literally impossible to complete, fix now also the king pig system is garbage. I accidentally piled up about 100 of each cake and then spent about an hour dragging my finger hundreds of times. Power ups are too rare. There should just be a feed all button or something, can I please improve the king pig system

FIX THE ROAD TO EL PORKADO I swear this is frustrating to the point of unplayable. No, those levels ARE unplayable. They cannot be done with this platform glitch at all. Also, sometimes in sandbox mode when I click the tick it disappears when it hits the ground. Occasional and not as game breaking or frustrating as the moving platforms not working but still

Generally great, but destroyed by graphics/world modeling glitches that render levels impossible to complete! Generally involving trap doors that aren't in the right place. Frustrating. AND the new cake race won't unlock rewards- 24000 hrs to go apparently so I can't play more levels.

I don't  understand why people complain about ads and call Rovio money hungry. If may be a "free" game but really nothing is completely free. Developers deserve to get paid. It costs to have a game. Free games have ads just like TV. And you don't have to make the in-app purchase. GO buy a game.

descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

Keilaranta 7,
FI-02150 ESPOO
FINLAND

Fun, simple game, but if I have the game sounds off, the ads should be silent too.

description: The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car. Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
descriptionHTML:
The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!
New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!

As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.
Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car.
Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.
Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.
Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.
Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
developerAddress: RAK FREE TRADE ZONE BLDG PO 10055
summary: Race in circles at full speed, keep your eyes on other cars and do not crash!
title: Loop Drive 2

description: Shoot enemies down and defend the Tower!General alert! They are swarming our sky!A massive attack took us by surprise! Enormous quantities of enemy jets, choppers and bombers are coming from all sides to wipe out your secret defense tower. Do your worst to destroy all the invaders. In truth ‚Äì it is a suicide mission, so fire at will and stand to the end!Upgrade your gear!Employ your own tactics and use various weapons, as each situation might require a specific solution! Set the sky on fire, destroying the intruders with the experimental arms. Do whatever it takes to inflict the maximum damage on the foe!Strengthen the tower!Discover special upgrade modules and put them to the test at once! You are the last line of defense against blasting bombs and rockets. Stand your ground by whatever means necessary!
descriptionHTML:
Shoot enemies down and defend the Tower!

General alert! They are swarming our sky!

A massive attack took us by surprise! Enormous quantities of enemy jets, choppers and bombers are coming from all sides to wipe out your secret defense tower. Do your worst to destroy all the invaders. In truth – it is a suicide mission, so fire at will and stand to the end!

Upgrade your gear!

Employ your own tactics and use various weapons, as each situation might require a specific solution! Set the sky on fire, destroying the intruders with the experimental arms. Do whatever it takes to inflict the maximum damage on the foe!

Strengthen the tower!

Discover special upgrade modules and put them to the test at once! You are the last line of defense against blasting bombs and rockets. Stand your ground by whatever means necessary!
summary: Shoot down all enemy aircrafts and defend your tower!
title: Tower One: Sky Defense

description: Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra,  Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two. Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.Special Features:-Take pictures and video of your poses.-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.-Difficulty Modes: Beginner Yoga, Easy Yoga, Medium Yoga. Hard Yoga poses.-Weight Loss Goals: Encourages a healthy lifestyle, physical exercise and breathing techniques.-Yoga Friend/Family Party: You can play this with one and two player modes.-60+ Yoga physical exercise poses.-Can share your yoga challenge videos and photos.-Artistic hand drawn poses.-Unlock avatars and backgrounds.Please ,leave a review and feedback on what you love about that app and what we can improve :)

description: Play the super fun bubble popper game! Pop bubbles and explore thousands of awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups, and features. This cool game is simply ideal for your Tablet or Android device. Step into a world of sheer amusement, clear the board of all the colorful bubbles and crush your way up to the top. comments: This game is so dumb it's cute. The spells and attacks can be difficult, but only if you aren't watching your MP bar. Overall, I'd definitely recommend the game - though some tweaks to make the combat system a little easier to grasp for new players would definitely benefit the game.

I like this game, it's a nice tap game. However, there are some issues I have noticed, it will lag. The lagging kills me on a regular basis, but that's okay, it has infuriated me to an extent. The controls are self explanatory, so this is a nice game for parents to download for their kids to enjoy as well.

Since the game cost money I didn't think it would be one of those pay to win mobile games. I was wrong :( a basic crawler and idle game where you have to either wait for gold to mine or pay for gems to progress

I have absolutely no clue how to play this game. I just randomly tap some attacks, I don't understand when they work. I don't understand when to use them. Nice graphics, looks good, but I just do not understand.

The game is nice but have glitches that need to be fixed when you get to the 10th floor the boos glitches and stopped moving while I was healing up. Also if didn't move Intel I used an ability. Also when using an ability like healing you get so7nd effects every time that happens it glitch not sure why but when ever you get the same sound effect from taking money or healing you get a little glitch.
Paid pay to win. You can't buy almost anything with money from the game. Childish gameplay and history (not necessarily in a bad way, but I didn't liked it)

comments: Im currently sat here with all this cash after buying all levels and all vehicles. Their needs to be an option to modify vehicles so you can make them faster and have more seats. The tap does not allways work and when it does you hit somethong. Needs improvement but a good concept. Maybe even a longer road to cross or an never ending level to see how far you can get theres the option to add different modes of gameplay. But really needs work at the moment.

Love it but Ive been playing it for a while now but out of no where it keeps saying unfortunately loop taxi has stopped. It won't let me play it at all. I'm going to try to uninstall and reinstall and see if that work's. I had most of the vehicles,working my way to get all of them.4 tickets and loved this game but it keeps closing out all of a sudden. And the split second I can play it now I have to start all over from the beginning. Come on man,I put hard work, love and compassion in this game. PLEASE HELP

Awesome Really fun and challenging in each road trip in the future of humanity and the best regards David sent from Samsung tablet and computer engineering department to the inbox folder in your browser address bar! The first time I was just wondering if I can get it to the inbox folder on Google Yahoo Bing bot Yahoo bot and I will be in the future of the day of the day of the day of the day!?

Almost had me I love it, but I looked at the achievements and saw that you needed to buy certain cars to unlock the achievement. I thought, okay, I can deal with grinding to get in game coins to buy a vehicle. But the only way to purchase those cars is with real money ($25 each) and not in-game currency. A game where you have to literally pay to win is not fun, and leaves no point to playing if the intent is to unlock all the things and accomplish all the achievements if it means spending $50 to buy virtual vehicles.

Had me at first I don't understand why the cop takes me away and to MANY FREAKING ADS fix it and I'll fix the stars till then y'all got  1 star!          An if y'all respond I want y'all to say I'll fix the dum ads not were striving to make it better fix the game or I will uninstall it! Its not a bad game just to many freaking ads and why the hell do I keep getting towed by the cops

Cynical I was kinda enjoying this game but the frequency of the adverts began to grind me down.  I looked to see how much it would cost to disable them, thinking I'd be prepared to pay a couple of pounds.  The price was ¬£14.  You're joking, right?  Instant uninstall.  Also, please don't respond with "Hi,We are constantly striving to improve our game. Hope to get better ratings from you soon." Try to write a unique response to each one star review. It looks better.

Block Blaster is Completely free to play! Get it now and experience thousands of thrilling levels and hours of endless cubes-blasting fun!

Make sure to Use these Fun Boosts:

Enjoy hours of fun, tap the bricks to blast them away and complete the missions. The more cubes you pop at one move, the better the chance you’ll unlock a cool booster that will help you defeat the obstacles. Test your skills in this awesome puzzle game, master the challenges, and complete levels.

Get this awesome game today for free, crush the bricks and win!

description: You are a master archer and the long awaited hero that will compete and conquer the Survival Hungry Games event in triumph! Now it‚Äôs the time to fight for your survival against numerous waves of zombies, soldiers, demons and other strange creatures that invade your blocky world dimension. Use your unmatched archery skills and manipulate time wisely in order to emerge victorious. Let The Games begin!Vigilante, outcast, master archer, hero. Your path has never been the one of comfort and mundane pleasures, but the one of adventure, inner search and hard training. After many years of absence, you have returned to your hometown to compete in the Survival Hungry Games for a chance to earn the freedom of your people. You now have a plan to crush the totalitarian regime that has turned the human race into a cruel sport for the entertainment of the privileged. It‚Äôs time for you to fight back using your unmatched archery skills, your martial arts training and your untamed warrior soul.Let The Games begin! The Survival Hungry Games event takes place in various locations of your blocky world, where the brave challengers fight for their survival against numerous waves of zombies, soldiers, demons and other strange creatures that invade our dimension through portals. Progress through your missions, mow down enemies and blow away groups of foes as you battle unique opponents with their own set of challenges. Utilize your archery skills, plan out your tactics and use time manipulation wisely, in this ultimate battle against all odds in this action-packed survival game. It's do or die...

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

ENJOY THE GAME!
Form lines of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to create a line blast and clear the board. Complete the missions and earn enough points to get 3 stars on every level. Drag your finger to move the aim and lift it to smash bubbles. Pop the bubble combinations and win points. Form a strategy to clear all the bubbles and pop your way up to victory.

💣🔥 Pop 7 bubbles in a row to earn a fireball that will burn every bubble on the way. Drop 10 bubbles or more to get a bomb that will create a big explosion and take out surrounding bubbles.

Why You’ll Like It
* 1000+ Challenging puzzle levels filled with colorful bubbles.
* Pop all bubbles to win levels.
* Swap bubbles for free and work out a strategy to beat all the challenges!
* Amazing boosts and power-ups that will help you blast through the levels.
* Addictive game mode.
* Play online or offline - anytime you want, no WiFi connection is required!

Classic Pop is the best game to play when you want to relax and pass the time.
The whole family will enjoy this fun puzzle adventure, so pick your target carefully and start popping all these bubbles!
summary: Fun and excitement are waiting for you in this cool bubble game! Get it for FREE
title: Classic Pop

descriptionHTML:
Be Ben, be an alien, be the hero! Are You Ready?

In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. Then take on Zombozo and his robots in 360-degree augmented reality action!

With Ben 10 Alien Experience you get two apps in one, a super cool face swapper and an action-packed robot blaster. Use your device’s camera and see the transformation take place in front of your very eyes as you become one of Ben Tennyson’s amazing alien forms.

Warm things up as Heatblast and experience his fiery powers or chill out as Diamondhead and see icicles appear all around you! Become Stinkfly and shoot out slime balls or smash things up as Four Arms. Take photos and record short videos straight to your device before sharing them with family and friends!

The fun doesn’t end once you transform! Take your device and save the day from waves enemies that only you can see. Use your alien’s powers to defend yourself from Zomboso and his robots in augmented reality gameplay. Use your device as a radar to find and destroy endless hordes of enemies in exciting 360-degree action.

It’s Hero Time!

description: Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It‚Äôs time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.Engage in Epic Battles Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time. Explore the Vast Arabian DesertThe desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.More Resources More ProblemsThe world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man‚Äôs fight. Invite your friends to playThis is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don‚Äôt forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be. descriptionHTML:
Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It’s time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.

Engage in Epic Battles
Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time.

Explore the Vast Arabian Desert
The desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.

More Resources More Problems
The world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man’s fight.

Invite your friends to play
This is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don’t forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be.

Support:
If you have any feedback, please write to us at serviceros@www.onemt.com
Privacy Policy: http://www.onemt.com/policy.html
Terms of Service: http://www.onemt.com/terms.html
summary: Enter the ultimate battle arena of this epic RTS MMO in a quest for supremacy.
title: Revenge of Sultans

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school! Features: 7 paintbrush colors 7 paint tin colors 39 character and prop stickers 10 animated stickers 6 magical drawing tools 3 Peppa backgrounds 3 characters to color in Eraser Choose to play with Peppa or George Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school Save your drawing to camera roll No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!
descriptionHTML:
Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love.

You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school!

Features:

7 paintbrush colors
7 paint tin colors
39 character and prop stickers
10 animated stickers
6 magical drawing tools
3 Peppa backgrounds
3 characters to color in
Eraser
Choose to play with Peppa or George
Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school
Save your drawing to camera roll
No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!
summary: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans!
title: Peppa Pig: Paintbox

description:
The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
‚Ä¢ 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!‚Ä¢ Troll famous video games!‚Ä¢ 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!‚Ä¢ Unlock insane achievements!‚Ä¢ Lots of wacky collectibles!‚Ä¢ No Wi-fi needed!‚Ä¢ A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that‚Äôll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber‚Äôs go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It‚Äôs payback time for all those levels you didn‚Äôt complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:‚ñ∂ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!‚ñ∂ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!‚ñ∂ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking‚ñ∂ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!‚ñ∂ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.

Features:
▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!
▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!
▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking
▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!
▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!

Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!

descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
