descriptionHTML:
Would you like to spend a whole day with Caillou? Now you can join Caillou in this fun and fantastic adventure.
Good morning, Caillou! It’s time to get up; we have a lot to do! Help Caillou to get ready and prepare breakfast. Walk with him to school, where all sorts of activities await you. Learning is fun!
Free time! Play with Caillou and his friends in the park and then walk home with him. It’s late and it’s time for a bath! Help Caillou in his daily routine, and don’t forget to feed the pet! And for you, how about making a pizza for dinner?
Ah!! Completing each task has a prize. Every time you finish a game or activity you will win a new Caillou puzzle.
Play a game of Snakes and Ladders with your friends and family. Roll the dice and move forward by solving the minigames found on the 25 squares on the board. Awesome!

APP CONTENTS:

A day with Caillou is divided in four day segments that you can spend with Caillou.
- Sunrise: Learn the time, get Caillou ready, prepare his breakfast, brush his teeth, and walk him to school. Ideal games to learn about eating habits, hygiene, and safety.
- Morning: In school you will get to practice maths, spelling, languages, music, nature, perception, memory, and space, with eleven different games.
- Afternoon: Time to go to the park! Here you can play sports like hockey, basketball or soccer. You can also chase mice, tidy up and recycle, or go shopping.
- Evening: Back home after a long day. Help Caillou take a bath before organizing his room, making pizza for dinner, feeding the fish, and going to bed.
In addition to these activities you can do puzzles, play a game of Snakes and Ladders, or have fun drawing pictures.
- Snakes and Ladders board game: Roll the dice and good luck beating your friends to the finish! Complete the game by solving all the minigames.
- Puzzles: Each time you complete a game you will win a new Caillou puzzle. There are over 30 different puzzles to complete.
- Paint, color, and create your own drawings with Caillou pictures and stickers. When you finish you can save or send your images.

General characteristics:
- Interactive educational learning game for children ages 3 to 6.
- All activities include instructions and visual aids.
- Kids are encouraged to learn through a reward system with puzzles.
- Promotes independent learning.
- App authorised and endorsed by specialists in early childhood education.
- Parental control.
- Available in 8 languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Russian, Turkish, and Portuguese.


For more detailed information about One Day with Caillou App, please visit: http://www.taptaptales.com

Free download only allows access to some app sections, extra app sections may be purchased individually.
Tap Tap Tales also has other applications such as Hello Kitty, Maya The Bee, Smurfs, Vic The viking, Shaun the Sheep, Tree Fu Tom, Heidi and Caillou.

In Tap Tap Tales we care about your opinion. For this reason, we encourage you to rate this app and if you have any comments please send them to our e-mail address: hello@taptaptales.com.

Web: http://www.taptaptales.com
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Taptaptalesapps/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/taptaptales
Twitter: @taptaptales
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/taptaptales


Our Mision
Bringing joy to children and contributing to their development through the creation and publication of amazing interactive adventures full of fun educational activities.
Motivating and helping the kids to accomplish the tasks of the educational game.
Learning and growing with our users, adapting to their needs and sharing happy moments with them.
Helping parents and teachers in their educational and caring endeavors with young children, offering them top-quality, state-of-the-art learning applications.

Our Privacy Policy
http://www.taptaptales.com/en_US/privacy-policy/

With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!
Activate your VIP-status, to unlock more game abilities.

Robot warriors war: be #1 in our worldwide leaderboard!

Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots is:

15+ robot warrior and super mechs with unique fighting mechanics, for extreme machines games
Personalization with the help of armour and weapons
Mighty iron warriors and thrilling robots vs robots PvP battle arena fights.

Breathtaking robots vs robots fights are waiting for you. Choose machines for a steel robot fighting and go to the battle arena!

on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/robotfighting2/

Explore ancient caves full of dangerous dinosaurs and rare resources. Discover new species of dinosaurs! Collect rare resources, craft tools and weapons, build your own house in the open world!

comments: OMG ITS FINALLY OUT! I've been waiting for this to come out for like literally 4 years! Anyway so far I honestly liked the equipment system in the original version better than this one.. I don't like the whole idea of unlocking equipment you got, that just doesn't even make a lot of sense.. Plus there is an equipment list that kinda shows you what everything looks like right now so thats a bit of a spoiler for me for obtaining new gear.. Other than that, the gameplay is great! You get all 4 characters much more immediately and I do like that. 4 stars at this point but I can see myself coming back and bumping it up to 5!

No touch response. I downloaded the patch, watched the intro, connect to google play account, input name (no illegal characters) and the button to create does not light up or respond to touch. LG G5 Canadian. Will rate better when this is fixed. As the game was just released I understand there may be bugs that need squashing. Good luck!

Pre-registered for this game and it didn't disappoint. Graphics are smooth, characters are great with fluid combat system. My only bad point with it is that after a few days of playing I went to open up the game and it won't load, I get as far as the n way screen then black screen?? Please fix Devs, anxious to delve back into it.

So far so good.. pretty smooth but i guess the graphic got downgraded because i remember this game had better graphic quaLity before.. maybe add graphic quaLity option? aLso the targeting system is a bit too hard.. maybe add an option to assist targeting because it's hard to aim i kept getting missed hits.. overaLL its decent.. keep it up!

The game runs decent although you do need wifi or a very good connection for arena. Everything is very limited due to the awful energy/stamina system which will obviously be a huge downfall. It gets repetitive fairly quick and is limited on what you can actually do. Looks like it will be heavily P2W with all the store sales and again, running out of energy quickly. It's a good game for an hour here or there but for a game that you need to farm items for equipment the energy limit really ruins it. I'll be looking elsewhere for a similar game without the energy/stamina limitations

Little disappointed in the way too long forced tutorial. After stage 1-5 I decided I didn't have time to see when the tutorial would finish. I'll try again later but so far it's a fairly simple, but quality SS fighter. Which is why the tutorial seems excessive. Game just is not that complicated.
description: Put your fighting skills to the test. Master the controls to dodge, block and counter attacks. Dominate in Real-Time Synchronous BattlesCrush your competition in synchronous PvP battles. Your skill and timing are key in this competitive action game.Your Character. Your Style.Play as any of the four main characters throughout the game. comments: The game is a lot of fun, very addictive. The only problem I'm having is it seems to close by itself. I'm running it on the Razer Phone so I know I can more than handle this game. No lag, no freezes.. Just random force closure. You should check that out devs. Otherwise, good all round.

I love this game. Every part of it. Even the weird "multiplayer" that's supported by another app... the graphics are incredible, music is intense yet becomes subtle in the background after a bit of playing. It's challenging enough to come back and try again after dying without giving up completely. I have experienced zero bugs or glitches during regular gameplay. You've made the perfect game for me, and I thank you.

In general a pretty good game, but the achievements rarely register. I have a high score of 11, and yet I don‚Äôt have the loop 10 achievement. I needed to get past loop 5 about 6 times before it finally gave me the achievement. Other than that though, I liked it.

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!

description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

descriptionHTML:
It’s your day! You’ve just been discovered by the best hip hop talent agent! This game will help you improve your moves, gain fans and show ‘em you’re the hottest hip hop dancer! Dress in street style, choreograph your own dance & climb the ranks at the big show!


LOVE to dance hip hop and want to show the world what you’ve got? This is the game for you! Hip Hop Dance School will give you the skills to choreograph your moves and STAND OUT on stage! Choose your outfit and crew members for the PERFECT performance! You’ve got to uphold your star reputation! Impress the judges and work your way UP the competition!


Features:
> Get your dancing shoes on & dance your heart out in this game, at the famous Hip Hop Show!
> Follow your mentor’s instructions as you make a name for yourself in the hip hop scene!
> Gain mad skills at the dance school as you climb the charts and score awesome prizes!
> Get inspired by your competitors’ dancing clips!
> Be part of an awesome dance crew and learn to choreograph your own moves at the school!
> Get a to-die-for makeover and dress up in the coolest hip hop getups!
> Are you ready for the big show? Get in shape at the gym! Try the cool freeze balance workout!
> Uh-oh! Dance injury! Go to the doctor and get better! Your crew’s counting on you!
> For the performance of a lifetime, you’ll need a great hairstyle! Get your hair done at the salon.
> After an intense day at dance school, relax yourself at the spa & get rid of any pre-show jitters.
> Show off your killer hip hop moves while your biggest fans cheer you on!
> Do your best to impress the judges and get the top score!

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you‚Äôre ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that‚Äôs why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you‚Äôre not scared, and you‚Äôre ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn‚Äôt made or supported by Mojang. description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! descriptionHTML:
This is fully physics based 3D funny street soccer game. All you have to is click one button and try to first 5 goals!

You can kick your opponents head with your legs at the same time, you need stay on ground for defend on your goal!

- Customize your players. You can unlock different forms with earned golds. (more than 40)

- With power up system, each round will be funny.

- You can active 14 Power-ups. Like goals, Small ball, or Freeze your opponent.

- Challenge in 3 amazing tournament mode. Amateur, semi-pro and Stars league!

- Choose your country and play against another countries!

- With 2 buttons mode support, you can play up to 4 players.


Click, kick and make some score!

description: Being a doctor isn‚Äôt easy, especially when you‚Äôre a pediatrician - a doctor game! Build a baby hospital and treat little patients like your own family - only in Baby Hospital Craft, one of the new hospital games simulator of 2018!Kids need you!Build a baby hospital from scratch and run it as a doctor and manager in one! Little kids often can‚Äôt tell you what‚Äôs wrong - it‚Äôs up to you to diagnose them and provide patient an aid! Become a doctor who runs a medic test, looks at injury report, cures diseases, takes care of broken bones, provides a baby day care and, generally, heal the world by playing minigames. Kids need a pediatrician like you, so take this doctor simulator to become one!Earn reputation of the best baby doctor in townBaby Hospital Craft isn‚Äôt one of these doctor games for educational purpose only. Here, you can also earn reputation and improve your skills. Every cured baby is happy and their parents too! Whether small children or a newborn, care for every patient - this lets you earn points, which every doctor wants. With these points you can buy new blocks, medical equipment like x-ray or defibrillator and taking care of children even more efficient! A hospital simulator that every fan of strategy games will enjoy!Crafting & building baby hospital like never beforeWith all new blocks and medical equipment this crafting & building game becomes almost endless experience. Build a new floor dedicated to newborn care or a playground, where virtual kids will meet others, have fun and even meet a playground buddy! Craft new ways to heal or even make a house calls to treat patient in his home. Crafting & building games was never so much fun - become a doctor now!BABY HOSPITAL CRAFT FEATURES:üè• Build & craft a baby hospital.üè• Become a pediatrician doctor and manager in one!üè• Diagnose diseases and run a medic test.üè• Read an injury report and treat patient properly.üè• Make house calls!üè• Earn reputation points to buy new blocks and medical equipment.üè• Improve your baby hospital.üè• Play fun minigames - for girls & boys!üè• Become a real Hospital!DOWNLOAD NOW and become a doctor who you‚Äôve always wanted to be! Only in Baby Hospital Craft - one of the best new doctor games for girls & boys of 2018!DISCLAIMER: Baby Hospital Craft is not advised to play for players below 13 years old without parental control.
descriptionHTML:
Being a doctor isn’t easy, especially when you’re a pediatrician - a doctor game! Build a baby hospital and treat little patients like your own family - only in Baby Hospital Craft, one of the new hospital games simulator of 2018!

Kids need you!
Build a baby hospital from scratch and run it as a doctor and manager in one! Little kids often can’t tell you what’s wrong - it’s up to you to diagnose them and provide patient an aid! Become a doctor who runs a medic test, looks at injury report, cures diseases, takes care of broken bones, provides a baby day care and, generally, heal the world by playing minigames. Kids need a pediatrician like you, so take this doctor simulator to become one!

Earn reputation of the best baby doctor in town
Baby Hospital Craft isn’t one of these doctor games for educational purpose only. Here, you can also earn reputation and improve your skills. Every cured baby is happy and their parents too! Whether small children or a newborn, care for every patient - this lets you earn points, which every doctor wants. With these points you can buy new blocks, medical equipment like x-ray or defibrillator and taking care of children even more efficient! A hospital simulator that every fan of strategy games will enjoy!

Crafting & building baby hospital like never before
With all new blocks and medical equipment this crafting & building game becomes almost endless experience. Build a new floor dedicated to newborn care or a playground, where virtual kids will meet others, have fun and even meet a playground buddy! Craft new ways to heal or even make a house calls to treat patient in his home. Crafting & building games was never so much fun - become a doctor now!

BABY HOSPITAL CRAFT FEATURES:
🏥 Build & craft a baby hospital.
🏥 Become a pediatrician doctor and manager in one!
🏥 Diagnose diseases and run a medic test.
🏥 Read an injury report and treat patient properly.
🏥 Make house calls!
🏥 Earn reputation points to buy new blocks and medical equipment.
🏥 Improve your baby hospital.
🏥 Play fun minigames - for girls & boys!
🏥 Become a real Hospital!

DOWNLOAD NOW and become a doctor who you’ve always wanted to be! Only in Baby Hospital Craft - one of the best new doctor games for girls & boys of 2018!

DISCLAIMER: Baby Hospital Craft is not advised to play for players below 13 years old without parental control.
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Be a doctor, who run a baby hospital. Craft, build & care! Newborn baby games!
title: Baby Hospital Craft: Newborn Care. Doctor Games

When I first open the app it's all fine and it loads and I can play. However the moment I close the app then open it again it won't load. It'll just stay on that screen with the tiger and panda. I tried undownloading and downloading again and it worked when I first opened the app but when I close out it won't load the 2nd time  I opened the app.

Right now I have been trying to figure out what my friends time zone is so I changed the time and time zone,  and I thought all was well. Unfortunately, when I got back onto Dash Tag I still had my unlocked pet, Smoky, as my character but it gave me the tutorial pop up. When I closed the game's tab and reopened the game, it had Sparky and I had lost all my coins, gems, and pets. Please help, it would be appreciated! Thanks!

Hello Wildworks! Please read this! I have recently downloaded the game on my Chromebook, which is the only android I own that has the Play Store on it. It would be easier for me if I could get it on my Kindle Fire. Please make Dash Tap avalible to the amazon app store as soon as possible! I would rate 5 stars on there, otherwise my review is a 4 stars. In otherwords, the game is great! It isn't as challenging for me since I already play many games that are like this. Since it's more challenging on the chromebook, I'm still stuck on the first pet you have at the start.  As I said before, please make the app avalible for the amazon app store soon! Thank you!

Although the game is fun, cute, and addicting, there are some things that don't really function. For instance, I'll watch an ad (particularly an ad for deal dash) and it won't continue my round. It works for all ads except deal dash. It also has some obstacles in the Coral canyons setting that are difficult to pass. Ideally, most people playing the game are young at age and I personally feel like the game is a little bit too hard. Overall, it's a good game, but I think some adjustments are necessary.

descriptionHTML:
PETS ON THE LOOSE!

Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! Choose your favorite pet and get ready to run with your friends and evade capture by Misha!

• Collect dozens of rare and unique pets
• Play as every pet you collect
• Unlock power-ups, outfits, and stats
• Speed through levels in pet cars
• Endless runner with new missions every day
• Free to play
• Easy to learn

Use the coins and emeralds you collect to purchase loads of upgrades like costumes, power-ups, and even pet cars! The farther you run, the more you collect. And the more you collect, the more fun you'll have!

So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!

summary: Become your favorite pet and see how far you can go in this adventurous runner.
title: Dash Tag - Fun Endless Runner!

comments: Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

Only game that has not begged for money and really is fun to play if you can keep up with all the fares driver's n cabs. Just try it yourself. It can be addicting if you don't take your eyes from it haha

descriptionHTML:
MASHA, run! – A game based on the popular TV series “Masha and the Bear.”
The all-new 3D format allows us to participate in Masha and the Bear’s most beloved scenes in real time, the action unfolding in our reality.
Our favorite hero Masha can’t seem to stay out of trouble! Help her catch the butterfly, collect treats for Teddy, race, and much more.
Here you’ll see familiar settings from the show, meet your favorite characters in 3D, and enjoy a few surprises along the way!
MASHA, run! will entertain not only your youngest, but bring fun for your whole family.

descriptionHTML:
Spielspaß und Herausforderung in einer App: Das neue kostenfreie Aufbauspiel „Mei Lidl Markt“ für Groß und Klein!

Du hast Lust, deinen eigenen Supermarkt zu planen, diesen immer weiter zu vergrößern und Waren wie frisches Obst & Gemüse, Getränke, Blumen und vieles mehr an deine Kunden zu verkaufen?

Dann bietet die Mei Lidl Markt App genau die richtige Herausforderung für dich!

Deine Aufgaben:
- Sammle Boni-Waren, um deine Filiale zu vergrößern
- Löse verschiedene Tagesaufgaben, z.B. leere 50 Mal die Kasse, um weitere Münzen zu bekommen
- Erspiele dir Trophäen, indem du z.B. eine Kundenzufriedenheit von mehr als 80% erreichst
- Meistere spontane Herausforderungen, indem du z.B. ein Rudel Möpse aus dem Markt vertreibst
- Sorge für die Zufriedenheit deiner Kunden, denn ihnen ist es wichtig, dass du frische und vielfältige Produkte in einer sauberen Filiale verkaufst

Features:
- Spannendes Aufbauspiel in farbenfroher Lidl-Welt mit herausfordernden Aufgaben
- Verschiedene Spielfiguren (Verkäufer, Kunden usw.), Waren und Verkaufsräume
- Strichcode-Detektiv: Scanne echte Lidl-Produkte für Lidl-Münzen, mit denen du den Boni- Automaten nutzen kannst.
- Boni-Automat: mit den hier erspielten Boni-Waren kannst du deine Filiale erweitern
- Statistik: Hier erhältst du jederzeit Einblick in Kundenanzahl und -zufriedenheit sowie deine Top-Produkte

Gut zu wissen:
- Die Updates zur App liefern regelmäßige neue Aufgaben und Erweiterungsmöglichkeiten
- Zielgruppe: Ab 6 Jahre
- Kindersicher: Keine In-App- Käufe, keine Werbung, keine Weiterleitung zu externen Links

Lidl Österreich wünscht viel Spaß beim Aufbau deines eigenen Supermarkts!
developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
developerAddress:
Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
Stiftsbergstra√üe 1
74172 Neckarsulm
recentChanges: - Neue Filialstufe: Der erweiterte Supermarkt bietet dir viel Platz f√ºr neue Regale.
- Erweitertes Sortiment: Viele frische, neue Waren locken neue Kundengruppen an.
- Mitarbeiter-Upgrade: Du brauchst Unterst√ºtzung? Dann kannst du ab sofort neue Mitarbeiter einstellen.
- Mehr Abwechslung: Die Quests wurden erweitert.
summary: The new free building game "Mei Lidl market" for young and old!
title: Mei Lidl Markt

descriptionHTML:
Time for you and your friends to become the best little chefs around! No adults are around and you kids are hungry – you better prepare food, and fast! You guys are in charge – cook and bake whatever yummy food you want, and have a food fight!

Uh-oh – You’re starving, and no parents are home to feed you! It’s up to you and your friends to turn into gourmet chefs and make a delicious meal! Who said dinner before dessert?! You’re in charge now! Get creative in the kitchen and eat all the mouthwatering food you want!

Features:
> Is that your stomach growling? No one’s home to give you dinner, so you better get to the kitchen and start cooking!
> Turn into little kitchen wizards with your friends and prepare your favorite meals!
> Go to the supermarket with your friends and fill your carts to your heart’s desire!
> Choose yummy recipes to make, from 4 amazing cookbooks!
> Dress up as mini chefs, and clean up the messy kitchen! Don’t forget your chef’s hat!
> Use professional chef tools to make homemade pasta and pizza from scratch!
> FOOD FIGHT! Get messy in the kitchen.
> Bake cupcakes and make your own ice cream!
> You guys worked so hard making all that food – now it’s time to enjoy it in the dining room!
> Oh no! The oven exploded and one of your friends got hurt. Treat him with professional doctor tools so he can bake those treats!
> Have bake contests and vote for your favorite food. Who will win 1st prize?

It is high time for you to start mining of bitcoins. Get the bitcoins with your own farm. Buy improvements and develop your empire.

The constant change in the exchange of currencies, the dynamic rate of bitcoin, the rise in prices, prices are constantly changing. If you like the price, press to sell and get your dollars.
For those who do not know what bitcoin or mining is. Mining is prey. Bitcoin is a crypto currency, a currency very popular on the Internet. There are also alternative crypto-currencies, such as ether, or etherium, altcoin, Ripple - the fastest crypto currency, lightcoin and others.

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out
summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

description: The fate of the block world rests in the hands of a small but elite band of rebels in The Survival Hungry Games 2. As their leader, you have called the shots and mapped out the plans that will crush the government officials who have turned the human race into a cruel sport for the entertainment of the privileged. It's time to rise from the ashes of the war torn nations and defend the blocky race against these sadists. It's time to survive.Progress through your mission and mow down enemies and blow away groups of foes as you battle unique enemies with their own set of challenges. As you rise to the threat, the figurehead of the district has sent mass mobs of clan enemies to smother your efforts. Take control, tactic and quick thinking is everything when dealing with this enemy. Deal damage in your quest and enjoy smooth, intuitive controls in this survival game. It's do or die...

description: Best free crafting game in 2017. Build epic structures using blueprints and explore a huge blocky world! Craft your own home or even a city if you dare to dream so big!Fun game for boys and girls. Build and decorate your own dream house in a beautiful city. This kind of house building & construction games 3D will blow your mind! Your creativity will be unstoppable and the possibilities endless. The whole world will be your own building sandbox game! There is no need to care about dangers present in the survival mode when you're doing your craft - exploration. Your house building game won't be suddenly stopped by attacking mobs.Protip: start the exploration in lite way by having a look around the place you spawn. Later on start crafting and building for free, placing your own structures using craft ideas from the blueprints.There is no need for PE, mods or launcher. The game features a huge selection of house blueprints for you to use - and expect updates with even more!Look around to find blueprints for the best building! Games like this allow you to express your creative side in countless ways. There are tons of craft ideas for you to test so you might be asking: how to do them? It's very simple, you just place a blueprint and fill it block by block! Get the best crafting house & building ideas here.Download and play this amazing free building game - it's like having a whole world to mine and craft in the pocket! This edition of crafter games features miner fun, crafting exploration and lite challenges - story quests. Crafting and building for boys was never so fun! It's also one of the craft games for girls, because house building fun is great for everybody!Unleash your creative skills while you mine & craft for the purposes of modern house building. In the current version there is no multiplayer crafting & exploration. Instead of that you can enjoy home decoration games with many rooms, for girls and boys! Craft a house of your own. Do you like to play building house games free and offline? Search no further, as this is the ultimate construction simulator (sim) where you can have your own house in your own world!Although interior design simulator might sound serious - it is great for kids, too, because this house crafting game is perfect for all ages! Design your dream home and perfect your house craft for free.Become an artisan of the block, craft voxel structures that will amaze and make everybody envious! Wait no longer, download now!

description: Cute baby panda Lu promises new and crazy nanny games for kids and toddlers! Play and explore different rooms in the house, and learn many new things with chubby and sweet baby panda Lu.Start your babysitting adventures and become the best panda nanny! Give panda Lu a shower in the rain or with an elephant. Prepare food and find out what she likes the most. Follow your virtual friend to the living room and do some fun housework. Don't forget to help your mummy at home too! When sleepy and tired, put baby panda Lu to bed and help her fall asleep after a long and wonderful day. description: Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters that will challenge your skills and help you to become a master of the block survival world.If you are young and fragile, expecting a fairytale, this is not a game for you‚Ä¶ We need heroes, warriors that master their skills through difficulties, always ready for the ultimate battle!**** TRUTH IS CHALLENGED****Enter a corrupt world where an evil government is working with the so-called New Intelligence, who have made an illegal alliance. Play as the hero in an explosive solo campaign where officials are covering up the truth about the dangers of guns, and the freedom of thought and religion have been all but been banned. **** YOUR MISSION ****The world is immersed in war and the fight for victory has begun, but to conquer, you must navigate the dangers of the armed enemies, who carry high-grade military weaponry and shoot to kill without a thought. It is up to you to protect the innocent and destroy those who have brainwashed the foot soldiers to obey commands without question!**** INTENSE BATTLES ****Battle your way through the edge of survival in a challenging life and death struggle as you navigate enemy territory and face aggressive mobs. Uncover hidden weapons to add to your arsenal as you move through stunning retro-styled pixel-art levels! The dramatic intensity of this undertaking is an adventure like no other, as you struggle in the fight to save the population before they are annihilated by the snipers and assault rifles of the enemy. See and feel the action while you bring down this conspiracy from the inside. You are the last guardian, unaffected by the new world‚Äôs lies. It is up to you to be the hero your people need. Don‚Äôt trust no one, you don‚Äôt have friends here, don‚Äôt get fooled by anyone.**** AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE, FROM START TO FINISH ****Hear the roar of your gun as you see another enemy defeated, always moving towards your goal! With the world at stake, Diverse Block Survival Game is difficult to put down! Battle through stunning levels while choosing from among twelve weapons collected as you play!What are you waiting for? Save the world, one block at a time!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters that will challenge your skills and help you to become a master of the block survival world.

If you are young and fragile, expecting a fairytale, this is not a game for you… We need heroes, warriors that master their skills through difficulties, always ready for the ultimate battle!

**** YOUR MISSION ****
The world is immersed in war and the fight for victory has begun, but to conquer, you must navigate the dangers of the armed enemies, who carry high-grade military weaponry and shoot to kill without a thought.

It is up to you to protect the innocent and destroy those who have brainwashed the foot soldiers to obey commands without question!

**** INTENSE BATTLES ****
Battle your way through the edge of survival in a challenging life and death struggle as you navigate enemy territory and face aggressive mobs. Uncover hidden weapons to add to your arsenal as you move through stunning retro-styled pixel-art levels!

The dramatic intensity of this undertaking is an adventure like no other, as you struggle in the fight to save the population before they are annihilated by the snipers and assault rifles of the enemy.

See and feel the action while you bring down this conspiracy from the inside. You are the last guardian, unaffected by the new world’s lies.

It is up to you to be the hero your people need. Don’t trust no one, you don’t have friends here, don’t get fooled by anyone.

With the world at stake, Diverse Block Survival Game is difficult to put down! Battle through stunning levels while choosing from among twelve weapons collected as you play!

What are you waiting for? Save the world, one block at a time!

comments: This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

The art work, the atmosphere, the weapon choices. It's perfect. I couldn't be more happier that i found this game. The only thing I would personally change is the Tribe Leader's cheering sound. It's a bit silly and is the only thing that truly breaks the immersion of this game for me.

descriptionHTML:
Drive and park 4 different vehicles from a standard saloon to a large bus.

Parking Challenge 3D brings you two game modes in 3D perspective view.

Drive and park 4 different vehicles from a standard saloon to a large bus with realistic physics, through turns and bends without bumping into objects and pavement.

If you fancy something even more challenging then try the Xtreme 4x4 mode. There is no road, The goal is to get the 4x4 Jeep from the start point to finish without falling off, see if you have the nerves to try.

Controls:
- Joystick
- Tilt Control
- Rotating Steering Wheel
- Steering Buttons
summary: Drive and park 4 different vehicles from a standard saloon to a large bus in 3D.

descriptionHTML:
Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is an exciting, FREE endless talking running game for boys and girls of all ages. Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest kittens in the world!

😻Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Features 🙀
- Dash, slide and jump to dodge obstacles and animals - don't talk!
- Chase the rainbow and catch coins with the coin boost
- Choose from 12 unique Kitty Cats, each with different accessories
- Equip the rainbow shield to smash through obstacles!
- Use a variety of exciting power ups to reach the high score
- Unlock new upgrades, cats and boosts in the shop with your coins
- Come back every day to complete tasks and earn exclusive rewards
- Great graphics and performance
- Free updates: New features and characters implemented regularly

Choose your favourite Kitty kitten and guide them through the forest and city as you try to collect as many coins as possible.

Run, jump, dash and slide to dodge obstacles and keep your Tom kitty safe in this endless cat racing simulator game, where fast reactions will be required if you want to reach the highscore! Run, surf and slide for as long as you can to earn more points, and collect powerups to double your score! Will you be able to reach the high score in Tom Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten?

In Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten once you and your cute kitty have collected enough coins, you will be able to chase the rainbow for a HUGE number of coins as the coin boost starts. Watch coins fall from the sky as you try to collect them all!

After you have finished running in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten, you can visit the store where 12 kitties are waiting for you to unlock them. Try and collect exciting cats such as Tom, Salem the witches cat, Jess the post cat and even Princess, the most royal cat in the land!

As well as Cats, you can upgrade your powerups, buy extra boosts or even purchase headstarts so that you can whizz straight to the front of the pack on your next run! Reaching the highscore is more possible than reaching the end of a ball of wool with all of these upgrades in Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten!

Subway trains, temple ruins and city streets can all be dangerous for a cute little kitty, so don’t forget to double tap the screen and activate the rainbow shield if you are going to crash! Smash through obstacles and collect extra coins for as long as it is active!

Make sure to come back every day to complete daily tasks. These will allow you to earn exclusive and exciting rewards!

Talking Cat Run - Talking Kitty Kitten Racing has been carefully designed for boys, girls and families to have ultimate fun!

Please rate us for future improvements and updates!

Invite your friends to play the cute, magical, addictive games designed for Girls & Boys of all ages created by Green Tea Games and challenge them to beat your highest score!

descriptionHTML:
By installing this game, you will get high-quality 3d graphics and realistic animations of professional soccer.

Choose your favorite team from the list of real teams-applicants and participants of the 2018 World Cup in Russia, go through the whole tournament, from the group stage, playoff matches and win in the final - make your team Soccer World Champion in 2018.

The game has several gameplay modes:
- Penalties
- Dribbling
- Combined

Game Modes:
- Single Player
- Multiplayer

Player Customizer: in FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018 - you can create your own character.

Install and play - it has never been so easy to be on a huge stadium and score a goal that will decide the fate of your national team.

Enjoy the believability of the football simulator, great 3D animations, simple and intuitive controls, exciting game mechanics, created with the help of professional soccer players.

Start playing and getting comfortable is very simple, but you have to try to win. The real stars of soccer are those who win the World Cup and get the coveted Cup.

Your progress is displayed in the online ranking of players from all over the world - the ratings of soccer teams and the ratings of the players themselves.

Every 2 weeks you have the opportunity to re-come to the top of the Hall of Fame! Game statistics - another way to show everyone your success.

✔ The game is created to unite soccer fans around the world.
You personally can watch the progress of friends and enemies from around the world.

✔ Finally, real animation and real movements of professional soccer players are used in the game.
Professional soccer players constantly help us to be better. That's why you can find professional soccer movements in our animations!

✔ Real confrontation
In our game are the best teams on the planet. Incredible scenarios of confrontation, of which we could only dream!

✔ The controls that you have been waiting
Master our controls after the tutorial! We're serious. It will only take you a couple of minutes. You run your finger across the screen - you make a shot, you move the goalkeeper - you save the ball.

✔ Improved graphics and detailing
Make sure of it by yourself. Game process is nice and the device works fine

✔Free travel to the main tournament of the year!
Today you can install and play FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018 absolutely free. The game also has purchases, but they are optional.

Install our soccer, win and become the World Champion!
summary: Popular soccer 3D game - become the football World Champion in 2018
title: FreeKick World Soccer Cup 2018

description: Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.List of safety tips:- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator- Stand straight facing the elevator's door- Press the button of the desired level- Keep the elevator neat and clean- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level- Stand still till the door is completely open- Prefer stairs in case of fireLift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Lift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game is designed specifically for kids.

comments: So lovely! Good game. You can easily make money and food, breeding and nurturing are pretty fast, unlike other games where you'd have to wait 24 hours or more for things to be done. Interactions with dogs are amazing, thet do so many tricks! I do have some issues with notifications (as in , I never get any ) and the packs; the game freezes completely when I take free or daily packs and sometimes when I restart the game I don't get the bonus from the packs at all.. And I was never able to watch videos for free packs.That is sad, but other than that this game really deserves 5 stars.

I got this game a couple of weeks ago and with the newest update, I can't do anything. Any time I try to click on a dog, the oven to get food, or anywhere, nothing happens. It's frustrating and I don't want to get rid of this game. Fix this problem please, I am too far in this game to restart.
Really like the game but the spin wheel is a joke. Total waste of gems getting the same result each time you try again. Impossible to get more than a 2 star dog. Getting annoyed! Seems rigged to me!

The game itself is fun and i like it, but its way to hard to get tokens to buy dog cards. Especially when one dog card can cost 1,000 or more tokens. Right now I'm stuck in the main quests because i can't level my dogs up enough because I can't get enough tokens without paying real money.
Its an awesome game. Way better than i expected. So easy to earn things and breed etc. The only problem i got right now is that it wont load for some reason. But will keep trying
This game is really good and fun to play there is one problem with the moving around you can't swipe to move around you have to press the arrow
description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies! Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES‚òÖ Gorgeous 3D environment! ‚òÖ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ‚òÖ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!‚òÖ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!‚òÖ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!‚òÖ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES‚óè Interaction with the dogs‚óè Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)‚óè More dogs and decorations‚óè Backyard / Minigames ‚óè Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!

description: Welcome to Farm Tractor Trolley Cargo Simulator 2018!You have obviously driven four gear cars and trucks on mixed tracks, but this is the time you should try stunning four gear drive on a Farm Tractor with dissimilar wheel size. You should try driving an auto mobile whose wheel size is not same, believe me its significantly difficult. Eight cylinder large beam engine make it even difficult to practice conventional driving skills on a Heavy Tractor. Live the life of village farmer & transport your life's earning to the city market.Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills on this new modified version of cargo transport simulator to check your heavy duty transporter handling skills on mountainous tracks and elevated roadsides. Transporting loaded trolleys with the help of a heavy tractor is not as easy as it looks like. This Heavy tractor cargo transport sim composed of very difficult yet exciting game play options which challenge your cargo transportation skills on various deadly tracks. Transport farming products like wheat, forage grass, pumpkins and other crops.Majority of young generation is not aware of what a tractor is, but it is the foremost component of farming even in this modern era. Farming is incomplete without cargo tractors which help transport farming goods from one place to other. This brand new 3D cargo transporter game will give you the real life experience of driving heavy duty cargo tractors and natural atmosphere which you have never experienced. Transportation of goods from city market to farm cites is not possible without real tractor cargo transport. This needs pro cargo driving skills due to long and bouncy tracks. Challenge your heavy duty tractor driving skills in Tractor Cargo Simulator, grow your farm and become the all time best cargo transport driver of the city.Cultivated crops when harvested are loaded from various farming fields and action villages on Heavy Tractor Trolleys. Forage plough farming also need Heavy Tractor to move to nearby markets after being loaded by the help of little cranes. This latest Tractor trolley Simulator is equipped with charming 3D graphics and a variety of locations and dangerous tracks to drive on while challenging your tractor trolley driving skills. You can enjoy variety of farming modes such as transportation of farming animals from different locations, transporting fertilizers and pesticides to protect your farm from insects attack, or delivering ready feed-stock to the nearby market to earn money. You can also transport wood logs from jungle sites to furniture markets to earn lot of money. Heavy Tractor Trolley Cargo:Rural Farmer Simulator Features:- Realistic cultivated lush green farms ready to be harvested- Go out in the field and load your tractor trolley with wood logs- Drive carefully to deliver farming goods to nearby city market- Manage everything on the ranch- Drive Over the Mountains and steep deadly tracks- Advanced engine physics and easy controls- Transport animals like sheep, goat & cows via truck driving- Loaded Tractor Trolley drive on Risky 3D tracks

comments: Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

The reason for my lower rating is simply because it's available on the android TV store, I can use a mouse to navigate the interface, but I cannot map the controls to the Nvidia shield gamepad, the inbuilt mapper doesn't recognize most buttons including thumb stick for steering. It effectively makes this game unplayable on the Nvidia shield.

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down thoüòÇ Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developersüòäüôè Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.

description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO

With how really cute the graphics are (complete with adorable cows and deeply chickens)I'm very sad that I may just have to look for a better one.

descriptionHTML:
What happens when you combine the ultimate farming simulation game with the ultimate cooking simulation game? You get 🐖🌾🍳COOKING COUNTRY - DESIGN CAFE🐖🌾🍳, the newest farming, designing, and farm cooking game - all in one! Bring the farm-to-table experience home as you grow and raise your own ingredients, then cook over 100 recipes and serve them in your own Café.

🐖🌾🍳COOKING COUNTRY - DESIGN CAFE🐖🌾🍳 takes you on a journey through a cooking adventure. You’ll be farming and growing your own fresh produce, bringing it to the restaurant kitchen, cooking delicious recipes, practicing restaurant management, and entertaining your loyal customers.

Your Uncle has vanished, and you need to manage the family farm, harvest crops, and run the Café! There’s farming and cooking adventure to be had as you harvest the crops in the farm and garden, work as a master chef to cook delicious food from over 100 recipes, scramble to serve customers in the restaurant, and design every part of your Café! Your time management and design skills will be put to the ultimate test as you become a master chef, farmer, and designer! Can you conquer this restaurant management simulation and save your Uncle’s Café? Escape to COOKING COUNTRY!

COOKING COUNTRY is the new cooking game that brings everything together in the ultimate restaurant management and farming simulation. Do it all!
COOK over 100 recipes to serve in your restaurant
FARM as you plant and harvest crops in your garden, making ingredients to cook into food
FEED hay and grain to the cutest animals on your farm
SERVE hilarious, adorable customers, including the challenging STAR customers
DESIGN every aspect of your Café, from the floor to the windows to the chairs
ENJOY exclusive events that reward unique decorations to add to your design
PRACTICE your time management, cooking, and design skills in this amazing restaurant and farming simulation

Can you bring your family’s farm and Café back to life? You’ll need to be a master chef, a legendary farmer, a star designer, and a time management specialist. If you succeed, you’ll save your family’s farm business & cafe!

This is a game for those who have conquered their craze for cooking, calmed their fever, and traveled across the world to become a star chef. A game for those who want the newest and hottest restaurant management, designing, cooking, and farming simulation. It’s easy to manage a farm, cook in a restaurant, tend to a garden, or design a Café. The adventure of 🌾🍳COOKING COUNTRY - DESIGN CAFE🐑🐖 is to come home, build the perfect Café, and enjoy the stories of the village as you become the world’s greatest chef while building the top farm in the land and designing a restaurant that deserves a Michelin Star.

Download 🌾🍳COOKING COUNTRY - DESIGN CAFE🐑🐖 , the newest and best fusion of top farm game and restaurant time management game. If you have been playing farm and cooking simulation games, COOKING COUNTRY is here to become the favorite game on your phone. Why wait? Download the best farming and restaurant simulation game NOW!

comments: The graphics are nice, but the controls are very hard. Especially in a boat. I finally built a boat, but I couldn't go anywhere because the boat only went in one direction wherever I tried to steer. The pets are very helpful, but there are way too many ads. I placed a campfire down but later it disappeared. I can't move an object I placed, and I accidentally placed a campfire in front of my doorway and I couldn't destroy it nor move it. Changing the direction of furniture would be handy too because I couldn't fit the bed in my tiny house because I couldn't switch the direction it was facing. I also couldn't make more than one thing at a time. If I were to cook food in my oven, I had to wait because I couldn't make something in my workshop while something was cooking.
Finally i got my wood house and a bad bt in NYT I  go to.bad  take some option when i m nt active I want take rest on my bad. And my all energy get back than it's a cool game well nyc game

I really like this game, it's fun and addictive! One thing happened that I'm not to impressed with though. I got a pet elephant, but it disappeared and now has made everything harder once more. Could you please give me my pet elephant back.

Call me shallow but I've dissed the game because there is no english flag. I know you might say 'well i can't put every flag in' but english must be one of the top 5 countries, especially for language.  For that i haven't given a good reveiw.

I see a lot of reviews saying this game is boring. Well, kind of right and kind of wrong. It is tedious getting started but once you figure out what you want to do, this game is like most surviver games. You get resources, build stuff and kill animals. So if you are looking for an action packed kill em all experience, this game is not for you.

I see a lot of other reviews dissing the adds for a *FREE* game (umm... Use cash for pixels and buy an ad free game then... Making games isn't easy and/or cheap and sponsorship {ads} is how it is funded... stop feeling entitled) My complaint is the lack of directives after initial survival is achieved and well I'm not a guy and would rather have a choice in gender. Fun but much underdeveloped. Love to see this built upon

descriptionHTML:
You don’t remember how you got to this island, but now you’re stranded in the wild. Surviving here will be no simple task. First you’ll need to find food, craft some primitive tools, and build a shelter. Think you have what it takes? Your survival adventure is about to begin…

Game features:
*Explore the wilderness!
*Build your house from the ground up!
*Utilize an extensive crafting system with tons of recipes!
*Meet the island fauna!
*Island survival sandbox simulator.

Survivalist tips:
★Begin with chopping wood in the forest. Wood is used for craft.
★Craft armor and weapons for fighting wild animals.
★Don’t starve, survivor: collect all available resources to keep yourself fed.
★Craft everything you might need.
★Keep track of your health, or you won’t survive…

If you like other survival games, play Survival Island: Evolve – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Begin your survival adventure now!

*IMPORTANT. Online multiplayer is still in development and will be available soon. Follow our news feed to be the first to know when you can play with friends!

We’re on social networks:
FB: https://www.facebook.com/Survival-Island-Primal-570956786397542/
VK: https://vk.com/survislandprimal

description: Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way. Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both. Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley systemin order to open path that leads to the doors.GREAT GAME FEATURES:- 30 Maps and continue update - Nice character fire boy is red boy- Nice character blue girl is water girl- Always support .All levels are updating frequently- Nice Soundtrack- Classic gameplay from web- Back to childhood
descriptionHTML:
Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?
