descriptionHTML:
Play in the pony dream house and take care of a little pink baby pony! Splash water in a bubble bath, mash green peas, change diapers, put her to bed and have sweet dreams!

Become the best baby pony nanny and take care of the cute pink baby pony girl. Spend the whole day playing lovely baby pony dress up games for kids, change smelly diapers, prepare delicious puree and baby pony bottles, and have sweet little dreams at night!

Pony Sisters Baby Horse Care baby pony games for kids:
· Take care of the cutest baby pony girl all day!
· Splash water, pop the bubbles, wash, clean and have fun in the bath!
· Dress up with the fancy little baby pony clothes and add the cutest head accessories!
· Prepare the most delicious pea puree, baby pony formula and feed her!
· Change smelly diapers, clean baby pony and make her happy!
· Put the cutest pink baby pony to bed and play bedtime rhymes!
· Dream about a baby pony princess, a fairy and a pop star!
· Catch the birds, fly over the flower meadow and pop musical notes in your dreams!
· Watch videos for kids and toddlers to get bonus coins!


Free & Paid Game Content
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money.
You can play Bedtime, Pea Puree and Dress Up mini games for free.
You can purchase separate mini games (Bubble Bath, Diapers and Formula) or the full game version with no ads.

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.

These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

description: Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft! Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Meet the people
Use internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!

descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.
Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!

Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your car.
2. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
3. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
4. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen. The side areas with the control buttons are inactive.
To successfully activate the interactive parts of the game, you must first drag the component of interest to the center of the screen while in 360-degree mode. Press to confirm your selection.

***Game features:***
- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.
- Different missions for different cars.
- Daily bonuses.
- First-person mode.
- Richly detailed car models with skins.
- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.
- Interesting map of the city and its environs.
- Fun quest- and arcade-style missions.

Play the beta versions. Follow us!
Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.

comments: This game is very interesting. The battles you have against others is good, but I wish the Characters had more verity in they're animations. Also the money you get once you win is too low. Leveling up only takes 2-3 fights. Getting gear to make them stronger takes 3-6 games.   Also; if this game gets an update I want the characters to have voiced lines depending on if they win or lose. As easy as it is to see the negatives there are some positives: game play is smooth and plays just like you want it to.  If it wasn't for the bad rewards I would say this is one of the best games Facebook

description: EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?JOIN THE FIGHTTake on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battlesYOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORYMake the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefieldUNITE THE LANDBuild your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliancesEQUIP YOUR TROOPSDiscover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilitiesDEFEND YOUR HOMEMarch through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of DunmarDESTROY YOUR ENEMIESHoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboardsWarlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.Are you ready to join the fight?
descriptionHTML:
EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.

Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.

Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.

Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?

JOIN THE FIGHT
Take on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battles

YOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORY
Make the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefield

UNITE THE LAND
Build your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliances

EQUIP YOUR TROOPS
Discover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilities

DEFEND YOUR HOME
March through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of Dunmar

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES
Hoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboards


Warlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.

Are you ready to join the fight?
recentChanges: Gozura is the artillery officer of the Frost-Blood Orcs. She is feared by allies and enemies alike due to her weapon of choice.
Defeat Gozura in her enclave and collect shards for a new regiment!

Once liberated, this orc regiment will blow up your opponents. This heavily armored, ranged unit provides a damage boost for all allied orcs and goblins while on the battlefield. She uses goblins as projectiles and fires them behind enemy lines for an ambush.
summary: Put your tactics to the test in an epic fantasy universe
title: Warlords of Aternum

comments: This game is by far one of the BEST games I've ever downloaded. There are so many different games within and the story line so far is awesome. I love how interactive it is and the fact that you have so much to work up towards! Yes the ads may suck but it's free so I can't complain. Absolute A+ for whomever created this, highly recommend and I hope there will be more games like this!

Nice looking game, from what I can tell after 3 levels. Do I want to pay $15 to play more? I dont think it is that good. I do like the interactive intro/start up, and the game runs smooth. Graphics look nice. But still is it worth $15?  Dont think so, sorry guys. But I am sure other people might get enjoyment from this game so much they will pay to play. Good luck with it guys.

This is one of the BEST time management games I've ever played; I've never come across a time management game with such a beautiful story line. You will not regret playing this. Plus, this game doesn't force you to buy it; just sit through some ads. It's completely worth it. I can't stop raving about this game to my friends. Had me in tears a few levels into the story.

Wow... just by reading the comments other people write impressed me. I love games with acual storylines... I thing all games should have a storyline now. (And yeah, I do love the game, I just hadn't finished it when I commented so I gave it a three for then.)

I can't unlock the Victor achievement. I've had every spot completely occupied, including the waiting area, check out and even the heart replenishing station and still nothing! I'll probably uninstall if this issue isn't resolved. The bonus level where you have to clean up all the diapers froze multiple times forcing me to restart which was really frustrating too.

I loved it! So rare to find genuinely good mobile games but this was great! I didn't play the previous game (or games) but this one was amazing with the story, so well crafted. The gameplay was repetitive, but not boring. What happened to Victor!?!
description: Your favorite doctor Allison is back in a gripping hospital time management game that you'll never forget! And neither will she... üè• üöë üî•‚ù§Ô∏è PLAY THE EAGERLY AWAITED SEQUEL to Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal and join your favorite doctor on a breathtaking new adventure‚ù§Ô∏è BECOME A DOCTOR in 60 captivating time management levels and 30 extra challenge stages‚ù§Ô∏è DISCOVER 23 MINI-GAMES and perform special treatments, like filling lungs with oxygen, focusing readouts and removing negative emotions‚ù§Ô∏è WITNESS A MEDICAL DRAMA filled with romance, friendship, drama, and life-changing decisions‚ù§Ô∏è UPGRADE THE HOSPITAL by completing levels and earning new equipment across 6 heated chapters‚ù§Ô∏è CATCH UP WITH THE CAST and find out what's been going down with all your favorite characters from Little Creek Hospital‚ù§Ô∏è COMPLETE SPECIAL CHALLENGES and collect diamonds to decorate Allison's apartment‚ù§Ô∏è ENJOY MANY EXTRAS like competing against your friends in an endless levelReady to find out what drama Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat will bring our beloved doctor? üë©‍‚öïÔ∏èThis season picks up right after the previous compelling adventure. Things finally seem to have calmed down at Little Creek Hospital... üè•But not for long! When Allison receives a phone call from her mother, she doesn't know what to think. She hasn't seen her mom in over 20 years! Why would she contact Allison after all this time? And what could she want? Allison is left with no choice other than to face her past, in order to discover her future... Will she have the strength to cope with everything that has happened and all that is yet to come? There's only one way to find out... Help Allison face her tragic past in this fiery hospital time management game! üíâ üöë üî•Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.Follow Allison on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:üåü Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal: https://goo.gl/pkAp5Jüåü Delicious - Emily's Christmas Carol: https://goo.gl/vmXbQiüåü Delicious - Emily's Message in a Bottle: https://goo.gl/PEyYzGüåü Fabulous - Angela's High School Reunion: https://goo.gl/UmfsOCüåü Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever: https://goo.gl/czC8qoüåü Dr. Cares - Pet Rescue 911: https://goo.gl/XNV042üåü Mary le Chef - Cooking Passion: https://goo.gl/xQRE0y
descriptionHTML:
Your favorite doctor Allison is back in a gripping hospital time management game that you'll never forget! And neither will she... 🏥 🚑 🔥

❤️ PLAY THE EAGERLY AWAITED SEQUEL to Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal and join your favorite doctor on a breathtaking new adventure
❤️ BECOME A DOCTOR in 60 captivating time management levels and 30 extra challenge stages
❤️ DISCOVER 23 MINI-GAMES and perform special treatments, like filling lungs with oxygen, focusing readouts and removing negative emotions
❤️ WITNESS A MEDICAL DRAMA filled with romance, friendship, drama, and life-changing decisions
❤️ UPGRADE THE HOSPITAL by completing levels and earning new equipment across 6 heated chapters
❤️ CATCH UP WITH THE CAST and find out what's been going down with all your favorite characters from Little Creek Hospital
❤️ COMPLETE SPECIAL CHALLENGES and collect diamonds to decorate Allison's apartment
❤️ ENJOY MANY EXTRAS like competing against your friends in an endless level

Ready to find out what drama Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat will bring our beloved doctor? 👩‍⚕️

This season picks up right after the previous compelling adventure. Things finally seem to have calmed down at Little Creek Hospital... 🏥

But not for long! When Allison receives a phone call from her mother, she doesn't know what to think. She hasn't seen her mom in over 20 years! Why would she contact Allison after all this time? And what could she want? Allison is left with no choice other than to face her past, in order to discover her future...
Will she have the strength to cope with everything that has happened and all that is yet to come? There's only one way to find out...

Help Allison face her tragic past in this fiery hospital time management game! 💉 🚑 🔥

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

description: Hi, there are many families who daily expecting a new member. A child is a blessing for every parent and every time a baby is coming into this world is waiting with great emotion. The happiness that one parent feels when he can keep his baby in his arms is wonderful, this sensation is unique and makes us enjoy life. We all like to look like a baby smiles for the first time and we all expect the first word of the baby. Perhaps you're a sensitive child and understand what feels a parent for his child and through this game for girls you'll be able to meet a family that is going to have a baby.To be able to do everything we planned you will have to play the role of a doctor, after the baby is born you will have to take care of him because his mother is very busy.Please follow all instructions of the game to care for babies.Good luck!- The child was born recently;- This is a playful, healthy baby and you will surely love to meet him;- First you have to wash him;- Fill the tub with warm water;- Use special detergents;- Use a clean towel to remove water;- Choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories;- While the child is in his room a few bees came and stung him, he needs medical care;- You have to disinfect wounds;- You have to remove the bee pins;- Apply an ointment for the treating of wounds;- Finally you will need to apply patches on wounds;- Before starting the treatment you will have to catch bees;- Now the child feels well and he wants to eat;- Offer only healthy food;- Offer his favorite toy;- Decorate the child's bedroom;- You did a great job, the child is happy.Thank you for what you did today, you are a brave kid and please come back daily to help us through this game for kids.Have fun!
descriptionHTML:
Hi, there are many families who daily expecting a new member. A child is a blessing for every parent and every time a baby is coming into this world is waiting with great emotion. The happiness that one parent feels when he can keep his baby in his arms is wonderful, this sensation is unique and makes us enjoy life. We all like to look like a baby smiles for the first time and we all expect the first word of the baby. Perhaps you're a sensitive child and understand what feels a parent for his child and through this game for girls you'll be able to meet a family that is going to have a baby.
To be able to do everything we planned you will have to play the role of a doctor, after the baby is born you will have to take care of him because his mother is very busy.
Please follow all instructions of the game to care for babies.
Good luck!

- The child was born recently;
- This is a playful, healthy baby and you will surely love to meet him;
- First you have to wash him;
- Fill the tub with warm water;
- Use special detergents;
- Use a clean towel to remove water;
- Choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories;
- While the child is in his room a few bees came and stung him, he needs medical care;
- You have to disinfect wounds;
- You have to remove the bee pins;
- Apply an ointment for the treating of wounds;
- Finally you will need to apply patches on wounds;
- Before starting the treatment you will have to catch bees;
- Now the child feels well and he wants to eat;
- Offer only healthy food;
- Offer his favorite toy;
- Decorate the child's bedroom;
- You did a great job, the child is happy.

Thank you for what you did today, you are a brave kid and please come back daily to help us through this game for kids.

Have fun!
summary: Newborn baby care - baby games
title: Newborn Baby Caring

This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.

comments: I really like the game...I love all of your games, but I'm a little disappointed with this one. How can you not have any white veils or shoes in a wedding game? Made the mistake of buying this. There are no white veils, which is ridiculous. No black or brown hair. No different skintones.  Hairdos are very limited. The flower girl looks weird. And the gameplay itself is frustrating. When you hit the checkmark in a location it just randomly takes you to another area. And if you've already been there you have to do it over again or the game will just assign random stuff. When you hit the checkmark it should just take you back to the map. The setup now is just dumb. Save your money. Wish I could get mine back.

It's ok The first games gave you the option of what color you wanted the girl's skin to be. Not saying this game is racist or anything. It's just when I play a dress up games I usually have her look like me, and I'm sure there are little girls out there that would want this too. I'm not sure if I missed that feature or not but so far I haven't seen it yet. Sorry to say this but if you did have that option. ...I still would of rated two stars anyway but that's probably because I'm in my late teens.

descriptionHTML:
You are survivor on island. Try to live, find resources, craft different items!
You must beware of wild animals. If you want find food - explore big islands or hunt.
Make other items for survive - unlock new weapons and instruments! It help you to get more resources.

>> How to play <<
Find resources, break trees. See on indicator on down of screen, it show strongest of resource.

>> Craft system <<
Open craft menu. There you can find recipes. But some recipes are not available because you need resources for craft.

>> Building <<
Open backpack and select item. You can make a own house.

>> Hunting <<
Tap to action button. Beware of predators.

Survivor On Island features:
+ new big islands!
+ realistic survival simulator!
+ various resources!
+ different recipes!
+ hunting or fishing to get food!
+ cool 3d graphics!
+ weather!

Let's start exploration island!

description: Surgeon! It‚Äôs a call from ER emergency room, patients suffering from various injury are waiting in emergency hospital. Let‚Äôs operate them and be a life saver in this brand new hospital games. So crazy doctor surgeon are you ready to use life saving tools, techniques and injection to become the life saver crazy surgeon in Kids Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Games. Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Game provides lifeline to patient that are brought to hospital emergency room on ambulance. You can also take blood tests and give injections to patients.Treating patients with kindness using best time management skills that will make little kids expert hospital emergency doctor. comments: Well how about the fact that you can only play half of the game, then you have to buy the other half of the levels.  Even buying the levels, the game on a whole, was a bit cr*ppy so I wouldn't waste my money. Maybe Goblin LLC,  should say that you have to buy almost 10 levels. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion so mine is: the game was bad. üòà

I wish these dumb ass games tell you that you can only play 9 levels before you have to buy the rest of the game. Having to pay for any part of the game means it's not free like you claim it is. Don't waste your time with this game.
Well, I bought the 1st package for a dollar and played level 10 and I opened it this morning and the levels 10-12 are locked again. Wasted a dollar. Don't waste your time with this. Uninstalling

Once you pass level 9, you have to pay for VIP. I don't like this and am uninstalling this app because of it. This was supposed to be a  free app. This is very disappointing, for I liked this app. I have been playing it all weekend, and just now passed level 9, which then said if I wanted to continue, i would have to pay for VIP. I am appointing any one who is going to get this app, to not, because of this. It is very dissappointing. The graphics however, are excellent, same with the gameplay. If you're stuck ok a level, you can click the lightbulb and it will bring you to a YouTube video showing you how to get through the level which I found really useful, because these levels are pretty difficult. If you read all this, wow. Good job. And thank you for listening to my advice.  And Goblin LLC, I wish you did better and thought of others when making the VIP part. I won't be downloading any more of your apps.   Thank you.

It is very challenging yet very fun. I finished 1-9 in a couple of hours. I do not like the fact that I cannot do 1-18, though. Plus, there are too many advertisments.  Overall, the game was extrordinary and very relaxing and satisfying, but you guys should limit the adds and give us more free levels to do. Thanks!
Ad placement is too distracting, graphics not that impressive even for being free.

Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process.


Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
summary: Simple turn based strategy game with a unique mix of tactics and luck.
title: Board Battlefield

description: Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress. Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.Try to top the leaderboard.Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
descriptionHTML:
Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress.
Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.
Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.
The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.

Try to top the leaderboard.

Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
recentChanges: New Feature added to make it a little harder and more enjoyable. Thanks for playing!
summary: Relaxing Gameplay
title: Balls Blast

description: Welcome to Ghost Town!Solve match 3 puzzles and unveil the story of haunted houses! Adventures, riddles, unsolved secrets and mystical stories await you!Games features:üéÉ More than 300 match 3 levels with unique mechanics that will not let you get bored!üéÉ Unique gameplay: explore mysterious houses and pass the match 3 levels.üéÉ Detective plot and beautiful story of the mysterious Ghost Town.üéÉ A new friend: meet Anna ‚Äî brave little witch who can solve any riddles!üéÉ More than 100 characters with mysterious stories and riddles - only you can reveal their secrets!üéÉ Dangerous enemies - tricky ghosts, mysterious spooks and the main villain - the Dramatist.üéÉ Exciting alchemy ‚Äî mix the magic ingredients and get magic potions.üéÉ Hidden objects ‚Äî look for and find loopholes and hidden paths, secrets, treasures and magic gems!üéÉ Useful magic boosters will help you to pass difficult match 3 levels.The plot of our game is quite simple and at the same time extraordinarily challenging. The mysterious Dramatist sent a spell to a mysterious city populated with kind and affable ghosts. The villain forces the unfortunate ghosts to perform unfamiliar roles in his mystical production. Only then good will finally be able to triumph over evil.Meet new characters and enjoy the best gameplay in Ghost Town!Enjoying Ghost Town? descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Ghost Town!
Solve match 3 puzzles and unveil the story of haunted houses! Adventures, riddles, unsolved secrets and mystical stories await you!

Games features:

🎃 More than 300 match 3 levels with unique mechanics that will not let you get bored!
🎃 Unique gameplay: explore mysterious houses and pass the match 3 levels.
🎃 Detective plot and beautiful story of the mysterious Ghost Town.
🎃 A new friend: meet Anna — brave little witch who can solve any riddles!
🎃 More than 100 characters with mysterious stories and riddles - only you can reveal their secrets!
🎃 Dangerous enemies - tricky ghosts, mysterious spooks and the main villain - the Dramatist.
🎃 Exciting alchemy — mix the magic ingredients and get magic potions.
🎃 Hidden objects — look for and find loopholes and hidden paths, secrets, treasures and magic gems!
🎃 Useful magic boosters will help you to pass difficult match 3 levels.

The plot of our game is quite simple and at the same time extraordinarily challenging. The mysterious Dramatist sent a spell to a mysterious city populated with kind and affable ghosts. The villain forces the unfortunate ghosts to perform unfamiliar roles in his mystical production. Together with the fearless sorceress Anna help them to throw off the terrible masks and return peace to the city!
You have to go through a lot of tests, solve many mysteries and reveal the veil of secrecy that enveloped the city. By revealing the secrets of the city you will be able to pass fascinating match 3 levels. Only then good will finally be able to triumph over evil.

Meet new characters and enjoy the best gameplay in Ghost Town!

Enjoying Ghost Town? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gt.match3
summary: Play this match-3 game, enjoy adventures, solve puzzles and have matching fun!
title: Ghost Town: Mystery Match Game

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..
Great time killer The only reason I stoped playing is eventually it would not let me see my scores without having to share on internet. I would not.

description: Police Car : Real Crime City Driving Simulation 3D is newly designed open world car driving game where user will serve police force as a responsible Police Force. Become a police car racer - get in your car, shoot enemies and destroy them. Earn points and buy faster police cars and better graphics.Become the best driver in the town and chase criminals in the streets of the city. Drive around the city in your police car look for the bad guys that have escaped the prison. Ride on police car and patrol on the roads of highway as the user would explore the roads and watch over law & order situation.  Drive from a garage full of powerful police cop cars on the most extreme stunts in the world! Drive, boost, drift, roll, jump, and crash your police car in our all new extreme police driver's paradise! The user must pull over the cars and check license of the cars, the user must rescue people which are suffering from any problem. Taking the role of the police, you drive around the city in a fast police car racing around the city as you want, crash into other cars, jumping from huge ramps, scale buildings, do stunts and destroy yourself and other vehicles. The user has to play in the free mode where user can pick missions from various locations within the city. Become a police driver, drive with traffic and get the helicopter backup to help you chase your enemies. Perform the tasks related to cop force as the user will keep the curfew in the city, the user should not let anyone break the barrier. The crime cars that robbers would be driving are super-fast so to compete with these cars user must drive turbo boosted police cars. Have yourself in the realistic car controls and in car controls with smooth gear shift.Following are the most exciting feature of the game:üöî          High rate of frames per second.üöî          Most realistic HD graphics.üöî          High Definition (HD) Display.üöî          Multiple controller options.üöî          World Best racing tracks.üöî          Racing and Sports car.üöî          Specialized night mode.üöî          Attractive lighting with shedder effect.üöî          High quality tilt sensor activated.üöî          Specialized physics engine.üöî          Integrated weather engine.üöî          Maneuver through the air while pulling off mind-blowing stunts.üöî          Ultra realistic visual effects (VFX).üöî          Racing cars sound effects (SFX).üöî          Police chase mode.üöî          Cop smash mode.üöî          Attractive menu screens.üöî          Dynamic 3D camera angles.üöî          Multiple camera views.üöî          Efficient processing in full quality graphics.üöî          Car animations.üöî          Guidelines screens.üöî          Speech bubbles.

description: The Amazing Spider-Hero was a regular teenage boy before an alien arachnobeast fused with him and gave him amazing special powers! He became stronger, faster, more agile and has animal-like instincts that can help him detect and avoid dangers. Instructed by his father who is an expert in 42 forms of martial arts, including taekwondo, kickboxing, kung fu, boxing, wresting, muay thai, jiu jitsu, and many more, he made full use of his new-found powers to become a hero of justice and righteousness, donning the mantle of Spider-Hero. But that's not all, the strange Spider-Hero's great intellect also allowed him to develop many useful equipment to combat crime and battle villains. Aided by his mother, the head of a highly advanced research center, the Avenger Institute, he created various versions of his Spider-Suit each more powerful than the last and further enhances his strength, power, spider-sense, and agility. The Spider-Suits also come equipped with highly advanced Web-Spinners which allow the Amazing Spider-Hero to capture or immobilize foes with ease and play with them like a fidget spinner.Even with all that, the Amazing Spider-Hero is still just a teenage boy, he can't be out all the time. So, he must go through a long journey home while defending justice and beating up whatever thugs and monsters that may be in his way before going back to the Avenger Institute.The Amazing Spider-Hero is heading home, but many strange thugs, mutant brutes and strange mutant bulk monsters will try to stop him on the way home. Play as the Amazing Spider-Hero in multi heroic action as he jumps across rooftops, enemies, and helicopters get as far and defeat as many criminals as he can before getting home. Use marvellous spider powers like double-jumps, web-shots, and hyper-dives to fight thugs and jump across buildings! Leap across buildings, jump above enemies and become the best Spider-Hero of 2018 and beyond! Will you be the truly marvellous Amazing Spider-Hero Homecoming?Features:- Amazing 2D Graphics & Animation- Amazing Running Gameplay- Amazing Spider-Suits- Amazing Spider-Powers- Amazing Spider-Hero- Amazing FREE Game of 2018Become the most amazing superhero, defender of justice, warrior of good, and guardian of humanity in 2018 and beyond as Spider-Hero, in Spider-Hero: Homecoming. Play now and prove your heroic worth!As always, check out our other AMAZING games at Gunaga! Thank you for playing.

description: Horse survival awaits! Play as numerous horse breeds from zebra to a fantasy unicorn, explore different lands, complete quests and make a horse family in a new animal survival simulator. Enjoy fun and freedom of wild horse in World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator, ride with your herd and fight for survival!In World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator you will:CHOOSE YOUR HORSEFrom pony or zebra, to fantasy unicorn or pegasusEXPLORE DIFFERENT LANDSFight for survival from African Savannah to a fantasy realmCOMPLETE QUESTSEach horse has its own adventure - complete them all!RAISE A FAMILYFind mates for your horse, make foals and ride togetherLots of horse breeds!Fight for survival as any horse you want in our simulator - from pony or zebra, to exotic unicorn or pegasus. Each horse has it‚Äôs own habitat and quests. Playing as every horse has a load of fun, so try them all in our animals survival simulator!Making a horse family!Fighting for survival together with a horse herd is much easier! Find a horse of your breed, be it zebra, pony or unicorn, to make a herd and raise foals in the survival simulator. To make your horse herd bigger, remember to make your own horse stronger!Explore different lands!Each horse lives in its own land. Go to the hills with any simple horse, to Savannah with zebra or African horse and to a fantasy land with pegasus, unicorn or pony. Horse survival simulator has a lot of places to go and thing to do for your herd!Ride through the different lands with your horse herd in our new horse survival game - World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator!
descriptionHTML:
Horse survival awaits! Play as numerous horse breeds from zebra to a fantasy unicorn, explore different lands, complete quests and make a horse family in a new animal survival simulator. Enjoy fun and freedom of wild horse in World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator, ride with your herd and fight for survival!

In World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator you will:

CHOOSE YOUR HORSE
From pony or zebra, to fantasy unicorn or pegasus

EXPLORE DIFFERENT LANDS
Fight for survival from African Savannah to a fantasy realm

COMPLETE QUESTS
Each horse has its own adventure - complete them all!

RAISE A FAMILY
Find mates for your horse, make foals and ride together

Lots of horse breeds!
Fight for survival as any horse you want in our simulator - from pony or zebra, to exotic unicorn or pegasus. Each horse has it’s own habitat and quests. Playing as every horse has a load of fun, so try them all in our animals survival simulator!

Making a horse family!
Fighting for survival together with a horse herd is much easier! Find a horse of your breed, be it zebra, pony or unicorn, to make a herd and raise foals in the survival simulator. To make your horse herd bigger, remember to make your own horse stronger!

Explore different lands!
Each horse lives in its own land. Go to the hills with any simple horse, to Savannah with zebra or African horse and to a fantasy land with pegasus, unicorn or pony. Horse survival simulator has a lot of places to go and thing to do for your herd!

Ride through the different lands with your horse herd in our new horse survival game - World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator!
recentChanges: A big addition to the herd comes with a major update including:
- New big locations: hillside and Savannah
summary: Join the biggest horse herd of the world in a new animal survival simulator!
title: World of Wild Horses: Survival Simulator

description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog‚Äôs race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs. Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily. descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!
developerAddress: No.2 Sumitomo Bldg. 4-7-28 Kitahama Chuo-Ku, Osaka 541-0041, Japan
summary: Story changes depending on your choices.
title: My Shelf: My Choice, My Episode

descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for a big water splash this season! Forget all the roller coaster rides and funland fantasy adventure games and join the ultimate waterslide amusement rush in the best waterslide 3D simulator game.

Enjoy all the thrills & entertainment of 3D aqua adventure park in this water fun game on your mobile without leaving the comfort of your home. So get ready for some extreme water-slide races in the world’s craziest water park simulator!

Features of Water Slide Downhill Rush:
⬩ Amazing environments to explore!
⬩ High quality, immersive visuals
⬩ Enjoy the extreme slider with different camera views
⬩ 5 challenging 3D slides game levels to enjoy!
⬩ Extreme water park thrills with 3D water slider
⬩ Less in size so easy to download!
⬩ Exhilarating physics guaranteed to give you an adrenaline rush!
⬩ Fastest water racing game action
⬩ Coolest & tallest water slide simulator

Survive as long as you can as you perform crazy stunts and blast through everything in your path! Whizz and bounce through rollercoaster-style corkscrews! You’ll be brave in incredible water parks and dominate some seriously insane tracks in this physics-based game. This is more than just fun in the sun…Have you got the skills to make it to the finish line in this epic thrill-filled ride? Download Water Slide Downhill Rush now and experience a extreme rush!

All you need to have is an android device to whizz through at lightning speeds in this racing waterslide game. Water Slide Downhill Rush is the next top trending 3D game of 2017 with epic madness in a water slide downhill rush adventure 3D.
recentChanges: Are you ready? Go on the brand new diving board and draw figures to make the coolest moves!
Walk to the diving board in the water park to enter this exciting mini game and have so much fun!
summary: Get ready for a big water splash this season and forget all roller coaster rides
title: Water Slide Downhill Rush

descriptionHTML:
Download the game for free and build lots of workstations in your multiple factories that produce cool stuff to collect idle cash. 🏭
The different workstations help grow your factory business and you collect even more idle cash. 👨‍🏭🤑
Be the operator of your factory business & automate your workflow by hiring managers, so your products will sell automatically. 🔨🔧⚙️
Your factory workers continue to run, even when you are offline from the game! 💤
Improve your machines & productions and your idle cash income increases! 💸💸💸

Features:
★ Manage your own factories and automate the workflow to get more idle cash
★ Your workstations continue producing, even when you are offline from the game 💤
★ Invest your idle cash and boost your income 🤑
★ Hire managers to motivate the workstations 😍💪
★ Use Super Cash to improve your products and sell them at a higher price
★ Open the game every 4 hours to get free Super Cash 💸
★ Manage up to 20 different workstations in each factory (e.g. toaster, battery, car productions and airplanes) 🔨🔧⚙️

description: Building, crafting & exploration in a square world full of awesome planes. Fly an aircraft (plane craft), land, don‚Äôt crash and choose one of many machines!  Explore the world, build an airport, craft a plane (from a gunship plane to a passenger huge aircraft!) Fly blocky planes above the cube world! Shoot enemy planes and create your own air force! Build a hangar, mine deep and craft unique items! Design the interior of the luxury jet or create a retro craft! Building & crafting! Airplane simulator! Game for teenage boys!  Become a pilot and fly away! Flight simulator for teenage boys and girls! A cube cargo plane or a giant airbus! You choose! Ace plane craft block! Aircraft survival - block planes! Pocket edition and Exploration with awesome square airplanes! Want to be a pilot? Start the cloud-capt adventure! Super war plane combat game with building and crafting! Fly Wing - the most awesome sandbox game ever made! Free miner games for teens! Take your girlfriend and start the adventure! Build houses, explore the land, create items and weapons start farming and fishing, or simply fly a plane! Build your Dream house craft your dream weapon and chat with your dream girlfriend (you can chat with NPCs). Not interested with airplanes? Build a theme park! Craft, build & ride! Square air! Survival craft & planes! Adults are welcome too!FEATURESExellent game for teenagersBuilding & crafting using blocksChat (talk to NPCs)Dating (date craft) - meet the love of your lifeExploration - sandbox world (infinite world)Girls craft mode (cute textures)Boy craft modeTrain tracks builder Over 400 blocks, textures and elementsFurniture - interior design simulatorFree game! description: X Construction lite of a train tracks! Build, craft and explore. Create your own railway system! Building & crafting game for teenage boys and girls! With trains! Rail builder game free! Train simulator in blocky sandbox world! Boys craft! Build and construct bridge, city, tunnels or even underground metro! It‚Äôs not train mod for  it's a full free game! Great game for teens and adults! Pocket edition of crafting games! Exploration. Build a train station and design and decorate the interior! Make your own adventure - train racing? Maybe an indian railway? Anything you want! Be a train conductor, train operator or bridge constructor! Train operator simulator game (train sim). Euro train super fast or retro choo-choo? description: Adopt the cute rabbits bunny and help her to grow up, taking care of her, dress her up, decorate her house and make her the cutest of rabbits !Discover the city of bunnies with multiple activities and games to keep your pet busy. In rabbit city, you never get bored !üê∞  ADOPT BABY BUThis pet needs a new family. You have been chosen to take care of this rabbit and take care of it !üê∞  TAKE CARE OF HERTake care of Bu and become her best friend, help her to evolve from baby to adult to become the rabbit city star!üê∞  GIVE HER A STYLEA gigantic wardrobe awaits you to allow you to make your rabbit unique. From the princess outfit to the the rock star, your bunny will be the cutest !üê∞  A UNIQUE WORLDMake your rabbits pet's house a magical and unique place. Customize the rooms according to your tastes !üê∞  GAMES AND ACTIVITIESBu is part of a cute and imaginary world, she lives in the city of bunnies, a city populated with extraordinary rabbits.But many other animals are hidden there and they have with them magic items, it's up to you to find them to unlock unique clothes !You will also find many other activities and games in the city of rabbits: The sticker store to start a unique collection of beautiful pictures, the photo booth to show the world that you have the most cute rabbits, a beauty salon to change the appearance of your bunny so that it is unique.But also challenges, missions, trips and mini games to take care of your bunny and have fun so she never gets bored !Now that this game and the universe of bunnies has no secrets for you, come and discover and take care of this cute rabbits baby bunny !Your turn !This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.Privacy policy: http://www.buthebunny.com/Policy_EN.html
descriptionHTML:
Adopt the cute rabbits bunny and help her to grow up, taking care of her, dress her up, decorate her house and make her the cutest of rabbits !
Discover the city of bunnies with multiple activities and games to keep your pet busy. In rabbit city, you never get bored !

🐰 ADOPT BABY BU
This pet needs a new family. You have been chosen to take care of this rabbit and take care of it !

🐰 TAKE CARE OF HER
Take care of Bu and become her best friend, help her to evolve from baby to adult to become the rabbit city star!

🐰 GIVE HER A STYLE
A gigantic wardrobe awaits you to allow you to make your rabbit unique. From the princess outfit to the the rock star, your bunny will be the cutest !

🐰 A UNIQUE WORLD
Make your rabbits pet's house a magical and unique place. Customize the rooms according to your tastes !

🐰 GAMES AND ACTIVITIES

Now that this game and the universe of bunnies has no secrets for you, come and discover and take care of this cute rabbits baby bunny !

comments: So I am a major mobile gamer.  And I must say this game is awesome in a number of ways. My cons however is: arena battles are way too long.     : more clarification should be emphasize on "finish daily or unfurnished daily", I can't seem to understand when my daily is completed by looking at the daily chart.  : too much pay to play going on. Mix it up a little plz.   Pros. Great story line.            Epic fighting styles.             Awesome mounts.             Super clean graphics.              Will keep u entertained.

Its a good game. One of the nicest mmorpg on the market right now. However, my only nitpick is the lack of customization of the characters. You get new armor but your actual appearance doesn't change except with outfits, but everyone has those so at the end of the day your character does not feel unique at all. The combat and navigation are on point though. Overall a good game but just lack of personal input.

Man I gotta write this again >~<... The only thing u need to fix is the bug that doesn't allows you to see the characters... It really anoys me b/c I'm a girl and only the boy characters are visible so please fix tgis in the next game update! That's the only bug that I have experienced! Anyways everyother thing is *AWESOME* btw my character is the puppeteer if that helps in something

It sucks! Idk why it seems force close playing for 1-15sec and I got out if of game! FORCE CLOSE ALWAYS HAPPEN. First day I play the game I got no problem. But since 2nd day till now ALWAYS FORCE CLOSE! AND U GUYS SEEM DONT GIVE ANY RESPONSE TO THE REVIEWS. SUCKS!

This is actually a very good mmorpg game, i'd like to say it's the best mmorpg, but, the bug isn't fixed yet, i can't see my character when playin, also the puppeter and bountu hunter. Fix this bug quickly, i want to play this game so bad. I can't enjoy the gameplay if the characters are invisible.

descriptionHTML:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed with a unique engine, it will grant you with both great combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! You have lot of things to do in the game including various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfights. A great variety of game modes will definitely meet your demand for adventure!

●Background●
The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.

●Features●
-This MMORPG brings you Skywings System, Aerial Battles
-Fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin
-Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles

◆Visual Feast
-Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
-720 degree panoramic view
-Exquisite character art and design

◆Wide Variety of Gameplay:
-As a MMORPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
-Call on cool champions to battle epic bosses
-Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique marriage and social system

◆Upgrade and customize your character
-This MMORPG provides 4 classes, Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior, along with 243 skill combination
-Customize your character with hundreds of Items, Equipment & Fashion System
-Pets & Mounts System improves your combat power

description: Car drive parking is a simulation game and the master piece of kooker studio. You can see many games in the play store for example simulation racing parking shooting constructions and many more. The concept of all these games become dull and boring. Repetition of similar games make it boring. You will really experience a challenging game environment in this car drive parking. After playing this car driving games you can increase your parking skills in the car parking backyard. You will become expert car driver. Get an amazing experience of car drive parking and drift along the car drive simulation 3D. Show all your driving drifting and racing skills as a legend and real expert driver in this car drive parking. While driving you will have to face many difficult challenges which make the game more interesting. In the car drive parking, all the cars that are selected very luxury and latest. In the car drive parking, you can park your own vehicles at your home and park. You have played many car parking free game but the car drive parking is more interesting rather than the other car parking simulator 3D games. There are three unique play style first steering second is tilt your android device and the third is swipe a slider. After a long drive, we have to park our car bus or other vehicles so you can fulfill your desire that how you can park in the busy parking mania. Car drive parking game is a car parking level game. You can park your car parking in the hill areas and city parking. Car drive parking 20 different cars stunning graphics and addictive gameplay. You can test your drive on city streets rural areas speedways as well as parking lots. You will be able to know that how you can park your car on the traffic parking jam. Developers add many types of levels that‚Äôs why we can say it car parking level game or you can say it car parking multi level. First of you have to put your seat belt than press the accelerator button and your car move forward. Be careful that your car don‚Äôt hit to another car if you did so than your game level failed. Proper complete the level gives you some bonus coins which help you to unlock new levels and cars. After the five levels you will be able to unlock the jeep and prado for parking mania. A new version is added in this game that its back camera  majority cars game have back camera but this car drive park has latest camera while driving you can rotate the direction of the camera as you like. Game Features.30 interesting levelsLatest and luxury carsVery attractive and hd graphicsIncrease acceleration on touching the screen

descriptionHTML:
Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.

When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!

In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.

Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.

In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.

Features:

Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;
Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;
Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;
Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;
Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;

When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.

The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!

Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.

Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
developerAddress: Suite 603, 6/F, Laws Commercial Plaze, 788 Cheung Sha Wan Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong
recentChanges: -Optimized the system frame for a better stability and game experience.
summary: Brand New Strategy Game, Battle to Win the Showdown with AI Robots and Zombies
title: Art of War : Last Day

descriptionHTML:
Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.

Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!

It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...

Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.
• Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.
• Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen.
• Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.

This application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4

This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:
playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/

PlayStation Mobile Inc.
2207 Bridgepointe Parkway
San Mateo, CA 94404
United States
summary: The companion app needed to play Frantics‚Ñ¢ on PlayStation¬Æ4.
title: Frantics

Perform outstanding stunts only when you build your canine‚Äô‚Äôs abilities. Reach the highest rank among the competitors. Perform outstanding stunts only when you build your canine’’s abilities. Reach the highest rank among the competitors. Your courageous dog will endure swinging punching bags, smashing hammers and ramps, and dash through runways while leaping over hurdles. This doggy will see the adventure of a lifetime! •Amazing 3D dog stunts game

descriptionHTML:
To be the greatest, you gotta learn from the greatest. In the post-prohibition world of weed farming, elevated entrepreneur Wiz Khalifa teaches you how to plant, grow, and harvest the finest herb on earth in this epic new game.

Follow in Wiz Khalifa’s footsteps as you build your own weed empire from the ground up.

- Tap to plant and grow quality kush for your clients
- Swipe to get your weed to market and get your paper up
- Invest your profits to expand your grow operation
- Boost your harvest with hydroponics and LED grow lights
- Find friends on Facebook and grow the best buds with your best buds
- Level up to unlock accessories and rare mystery strains

Please note that Wiz Khalifa’s Weed Farm is free to download and play. Some in-game items are available for purchase using real money.
summary: Follow in Wiz Khalifa‚Äôs footsteps as you build a weed empire from the ground up.
title: Wiz Khalifa's Weed Farm

description: One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. descriptionHTML:
One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch.

In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.

Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!

comments: If you like üç¨ Crush on Facebook? Then you will like this game even better. The graphics are cute and the üêü give you occasional hints as to what will make them super happy. And then you have that "Aha" moment. There it is.  The trap is set. Lol you are not continuing to play because it is addictive. You play in order to collect coins so you can buy stuff to make the little fish happy. üíò the graphics kind of a little like an underwater Farmville with the plants üêü and decorations you can get fort your aquarium. I do play with üé∂ turned off. Cute game so far.        Graphics make it better than Candy Crush.

With an easy guide, on 'How to play'. Once you get going its great fun. Dare I say quite addictive. Fantastic animations. Amazing back ground music. Plus, no app freezes either.  Its an 'A‚òÜ' from me at least.  Only, what would be a great idea. Is all the piggy bank jewels you build up, should be awarded for your hard efforts. Should not have to buy them back.  Only purchase jewels when desperate.

Great game but would love it more if it kept track of when you bought something . Like a little quantity number in the corner after you purchase a fish or decorations. Hard to save up to buy things for guests, sucks when you buy something you already have when trying to complete a task. Other then that it's a great game lol I enjoy playing it.

Great game. Challenging, fun, and addictive lol. I'm 32 and play this often so it's not just for kids . Give it a try it's very satisfying . Just wished you could add friends ... People that play whom you may not know so we all could help each other. That would make it more interactive and a lot more fun. No one I know plays so it would have to be other fellow fishermen üòâ

Fantastic game! It's great fun decorating the aqariums and the game board is very clear. The recent move of the boosters to the right hand side of the screen was a VERY bad decision, as I have accidentally used them when my hand has brushed against them - this has happened many times already. A good addition would be a marker indicating a purchased item.

Because you only get 5 lives and you make some levels with too few moves. It would be nice if you could interact more with your fish and tanks. The whole point of beating levels is to build up your tanks...but you can't do anything with them while waiting for lives. It would be a fantastic game if there was more to do within the tanks!

descriptionHTML:
Fight, kill, survive! Tired of the mundane grind of daily life? Do you crave that indescribable thrill that gets you all pumped-up? Then Survival Squad is for you!

You’ll be dropped on a realistic 3D deserted island, with mountains, rivers, gas stations and houses galore, ensuring that no replay is ever the same. This unprecedented survival simulation game allows great freedom of gameplay: go parachuting, start a gun-fight-slash-car-chase, or rob other players of their resources and watch the poor weaklings squirm and cry—here in Survival Squad your imagination is the only limit.

Join thousands of others on your server and try to outlive the other players on the island—after all, only one out of all 100 may leave the arena alive! Once you die, you’re eliminated—it’s that simple. Straightforward, minimalist and cruel, this Battle Royale is not for the faint-hearted.

comments: Got 4 stars for the creepy factor.  This game was released,I think, for Halloween 2016 on PC.  I'm starting to investigate a bit more before buying but have purchased just for something to do in my spare time.  Not too far in but there are things to collect and the map does transport you.  So far no problems with picking up items or lagging.  Will update if I encounter any problems.

Yay, a new game for us Android users!  And it was wonderful........ my favorite part is the Match 3 that you can play instead of some of the Hidden Object puzzles.   Has all the other Bells and whistles that I've come to expect in a game.   Thanx

Lots of bugs. Awkward games, one where you are supposed to move a receptionist figure through double doors to win, first the figure looks like a toy soldier or a doorman not a receptionist. Controls are very spotty. Sometimes good often times not. Very disappointed that Eipix would release this game with so many issues. Clearly this platform isn't BF's focus because we haven't had a good game since last year.

Finally!  Big Fish finally gave Android gamers a new game!  A GREAT GAME!  I enjoyed every this game so much!  WELL DONE again EIPIX! Game has customizable difficulty settings, hidden morphing objects throughout (with a spinning spiral that is lit up so you know to look and stops spinning if you've found it.) This is GREAT so you're not so distracted double checking yourself that you don't enjoy the game,  bonus chapter, teleporting map, souvenir room that has a little more than just looking for objects AND strategy guide! My ONLY complaint is NO zoom‚Ä¢in that stays after you click objects.  But still money well spent!  Hopefully we won't have to wait 3 months for another new game!

Phantasmat rein of shadows. Just trying to figure the game out. Now I am at the washer where I need to fix the circuit board and I keep crashing please fix this! Back when finished. Finished finally! Great game! Once you fixed the problem the game played fantastic! Looking for a great sequel!

Waited weeks for a new big fish and found this one disappointing, I know it's meant to be spooky but I had to turn my screen up to 100% which I never do to stand any chance of completing it. The story line was ok at best and the responsiveness to tapping wasn't brilliant

descriptionHTML:
★★★★★ Welcome to Horsecraft! ★★★★★

Are you looking for adventures? Want to ride a horse through the prairie into the sunset? Or do you want to be able to do magic? Maybe you want to build a farm? All this and much more can be found in our new game Horsecraft.

There are wolves, cats, horses, rabbits, cows, pigs, sheep and much more.
Find gold, diamonds, stones, raw materials, wood and make whatever you want, for example Strong Ax, Deadly Sword, Lightning-fast Bow, or build something beautiful, e.g. A house, a farm, a village, or even a city.

There is much to discover and explore. It becomes particularly interesting in survival mode, where you are on your own and should create everything yourself.

Let's go. Have a lot of fun. And please do not forget to leave a Comment. Because I'm happy about your opinion and want to hear from you what you like about my game and what I could possibly improve.

In addition, I would like to ask you, if you naturally have a desire to translate the description of the game to your own language without errors and send me this to my email. That would be a big help for me. Many Thanks!!!
